                        &lt;script type="text/javascript">
                        $(function () {
                          function getNowFormatDate() {
                            var date = new Date();
                            var month = date.getMonth() + 1;
                            var strDate = date.getDate();
                            var currentdate = month + "月" + strDate + "日";
                            return currentdate;
                          }
                          var text = [
                             "如果你使用手机观看的话，推荐解析后使用全屏观看！",
                             "如果解析接口有广告，请选择更换接口解析！",
                             "村少博客视频解析接口：3个（状态：正常）",
                             "解析失效请及时联系站长更换！",
                             "村少博客解析是免费使用的，请勿被骗！",
                          ], content = "";
                          for (var i = 0; i &lt; text.length; i++) {
                            content += (i + 1) + ". " + text[i] + "\n";
                          }
                          setTimeout(function () {
                            swal(getNowFormatDate() + "通知", content, "success");
                          }, 1000)
                        })
                      &lt;/script>
                        &lt;/body>
                    &lt;/html></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">子比主题添加教程</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>方法一、（简单）也就是上面的食用教程，通过后台页面添加，无需担心主题更新后页面消失的问题。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>方法二、（需要有点基础）为了能够更好的体验和适应子比主题，我对代码进行集成PHP文件（本站也采用这个方法），直接下载我准备好的PHP文件源码，然后上传到主题目录下的pages目录，最后在后台—&gt;新建页面—&gt;选择“视频在线解析页面”—&gt;写标题保存即可。更新主题之后PHP文件消失即页面消失，更新主题时请备份PHP文件。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270716} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/785ada9b9c164212.jpg" alt="图片[5]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270716"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_6">添加热门标签页面</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>热门标签页面其实很早以前就想做了，但是没有正式学过前端相关的语言，自己写也写不出来，再加自己学业的原因一直没有时间去网上资料，所以就把这件事放到了脑后。昨天考完了试，终于把有时间把网站升了一下级，顺便把热门标签这个页面给弄了一下。自己写不出来，所以热门标签页面的样式借鉴了B2主题的标签聚合页样式进行了一些修改，尽量的适应子比主题，所以昨天一晚上都在弄热门标签页面适配手机端的问题。但还是有一些小小小的不足，熟悉前端的大佬提一下修改的建议。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_12755" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_12755"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、进入子比主题目录—&gt;pages这个目录下创建PHP文件，然后把下面的代码添加进去。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码作了隐藏，昨天弄了一晚上，饭都没吃上，嘿嘿，评论点赞一下！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>尝鲜版代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php

/**
 * Template name: 热门标签页面
 * Description:   Hot_Tags
 */

// 获取链接列表
get_header();
$header_style = zib_get_page_header_style();
?>
&lt;main class="container">
    &lt;div class="content-wrap">
        &lt;div class="content-layout">
            &lt;?php while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
                &lt;?php if ($header_style != 1) {
                    echo zib_get_page_header();
                } ?>
                &lt;div class="box-body theme-box radius8 main-bg main-shadow">
                    &lt;?php if ($header_style == 1) {
                        echo zib_get_page_header();
                    } ?>
                    &lt;div class="tagslist tags-page wrapper">
                        &lt;ul>
                          &lt;?php 
                            $tags_count = 60;
                            $tagslist = get_tags('orderby=count&amp;order=DESC&amp;number='.$tags_count);
                            foreach($tagslist as $tag) {
                              echo '&lt;li style="list-style-type:none;">&lt;a class="name box b2-radius b2-mg" href="'.get_tag_link($tag).'">&lt;h2>'. $tag->name .'&lt;/h2>&lt;small>&lt;/br>&lt;p>共'. $tag->count .'篇文章&lt;/p>&lt;/a>&lt;/li>';} 
                          ?>
                        &lt;/ul>
                    &lt;/div>
                    &lt;?php wp_link_pages('link_before=&lt;span>&amp;link_after=&lt;/span>&amp;before=&lt;div class="article-paging">&amp;after=&lt;/div>&amp;next_or_number=number'); ?>
                &lt;?php endwhile;  ?>
                &lt;/div>
                &lt;?php comments_template('/template/comments.php', true); ?>
        &lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;?php get_sidebar(); ?>
&lt;!--CSS样式-->
  &lt;style type="text/css">
 body{padding: 0px; margin: 0px;} *, *::before, *::after{box-sizing: border-box;} a, abbr, acronym, address, applet, big, blockquote, body, caption, cite, code, dd, del, dfn, div, dl, dt, em, fieldset, figure, font, form, h1, h2, h4, h5, h6, html, iframe, ins, kbd, label, legend, li, object, ol, p, pre, q, s, samp, small, span, strike, strong, sub, sup, table, tbody, td, tfoot, th, thead, tr, tt, ul, var{border: 0; font-family: inherit; font-size: 100%; font-style: inherit; font-weight: inherit; margin: 0; outline: 0; padding: 0; vertical-align: baseline; box-sizing: border-box;} a{cursor: pointer;} a{color: inherit; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: top;} ol, ul{list-style: none;}.wrapper{width: 1142px; max-width: 100%; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0;} .b2-mg{margin: 16px;} .b2-radius{border-radius: 5px;} .box,.side-fixed{background-color: #fff;-webkit-transition: all .2s cubic-bezier(.455,.03,.515,.955); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3);-moz-box-shadow:0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3);box-shadow: 0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3)box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #ebebed;box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(26,26,26,.1);box-shadow: 0px 5px 40px -1px rgba(2, 10, 18, 0.1);}/*标签页面*/.tags-page ul{display: flex; flex-flow: wrap;}.tags-page ul li{width: 16.66667%;}.tags-page ul li a{display: block; padding: 20px 10px; text-align: center; border-radius: 10px;}.tags-page ul li a{background-color: #FF6666; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);}.tags-page ul li a:hover{box-shadow: 0 3px 10px #ccc; border: 2px solid #fff;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 2) a{background-color: #FF9900;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 3) a{background-color: #339966;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 4) a{background-color: #339999;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 5) a{background-color: #6699CC;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 6) a{background-color: #8f82bc;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 7) a{background-color: #FF99CC;}.tags-page ul li h2{display: -webkit-box; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; height: 25px; overflow: hidden; margin-bottom: -20px; font-weight: 800; font-size: 17px; color: #fff;}.tags-page ul li p{font-size: 12px; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.63);}.tags-page h1{font-size: 28px; text-align: center; margin: 30px 0;}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){.tags-page ul li{width: 50%;} .tags-page h1{margin: 20px 0;} .tags-page ul li a{padding: 10px 5px;}}
  &lt;/style>
&lt;/main>
&lt;?php
get_footer();</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>修改版（最终版）本站推荐使用的版本，php文件暂时没时间上传，请复制粘贴即可，谢谢。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php

/**
 * Template name: 热门标签页面
 * Description:   Hot_Tags
 */

// 获取链接列表
get_header();
$header_style = zib_get_page_header_style();
?>
&lt;main class="container">
    &lt;div class="content-wrap">
        &lt;div class="content-layout">
            &lt;?php while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
                &lt;?php if ($header_style != 1) {
                    echo zib_get_page_header();
                } ?>
                &lt;div class="box-body theme-box radius8 main-bg main-shadow">
                    &lt;?php if ($header_style == 1) {
                        echo zib_get_page_header();
                    } ?>
                    &lt;div class="tagslist tags-page wrapper">
                        &lt;ul>
                          &lt;?php 
                            $tags_count = 60;
                            $tagslist = get_tags('orderby=count&amp;order=DESC&amp;number='.$tags_count);
                            foreach($tagslist as $tag) {
                              echo '&lt;li style="list-style-type:none;">&lt;a class="name box b2-radius b2-mg" href="'.get_tag_link($tag).'">&lt;h2>'. $tag->name .'&lt;/h2>&lt;small>&lt;/br>&lt;p>共'. $tag->count .'篇文章&lt;/p>&lt;/a>&lt;/li>';} 
                          ?>
                        &lt;/ul>
                    &lt;/div>
                    &lt;?php wp_link_pages('link_before=&lt;span>&amp;link_after=&lt;/span>&amp;before=&lt;div class="article-paging">&amp;after=&lt;/div>&amp;next_or_number=number'); ?>
                &lt;?php endwhile;  ?>
                &lt;/div>
                &lt;?php comments_template('/template/comments.php', true); ?>
        &lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;?php get_sidebar(); ?>
&lt;!--CSS样式-->
  &lt;style type="text/css">
 .wrapper{/*width: 1142px; max-width: 100%;*/ margin: 0 auto; padding: 0;} .b2-mg{margin: 16px;} .b2-radius{border-radius: 5px;} .box,.side-fixed{background-color: #fff;-webkit-transition: all .2s cubic-bezier(.455,.03,.515,.955); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3);-moz-box-shadow:0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3);box-shadow: 0 0 22px -12px rgba(0,36,100,.3)box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #ebebed;box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(26,26,26,.1);box-shadow: 0px 5px 40px -1px rgba(2, 10, 18, 0.1);}/*标签页面*/.tags-page ul{display: flex; flex-flow: wrap;}.tags-page ul li{width: 16.66667%;}.tags-page ul li a{display: block; padding: 20px 10px; text-align: center; border-radius: 10px;}.tags-page ul li a{background-color: #FF6666; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);}.tags-page ul li a:hover{box-shadow: 0 3px 10px #ccc; border: 2px solid #fff;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 2) a{background-color: #FF9900;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 3) a{background-color: #339966;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 4) a{background-color: #339999;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 5) a{background-color: #6699CC;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 6) a{background-color: #8f82bc;}.tags-page ul li:nth-child(7n + 7) a{background-color: #FF99CC;}.tags-page ul li h2{display: -webkit-box; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; height: 25px; overflow: hidden; margin-bottom: -20px; font-weight: 700; font-size: 17px; color: #fff;}.tags-page ul li p{font-size: 12px; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.63);}.tags-page h1{font-size: 28px; text-align: center; margin: 30px 0;}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){.tags-page ul li{width: 50%;} .tags-page h1{margin: 20px 0;} .tags-page ul li a{padding: 10px 5px;}}.b2-radius:not(article){transition: all 0.3s;}.b2-radius:not(article):hover{transform: translateY(-10px);}
  &lt;/style>
&lt;/main>
&lt;?php
get_footer();</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p id="block-9251079e-1c18-4ddb-bd6c-03dc013e8b5c">2、把上面的代码添加进行保存后，进入到后台—&gt;页面—&gt;新建页面—-&gt;选择热门标签页面即可使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p id="block-f29c135c-da89-436e-ae52-7a6d0bdad128">3、如果懒得创建添加PHP文件的话，可以下载下面我创建好的PHP文件，上传到子比主题的pages这个目录下，然后按照第2点进行创建页面就好了。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p id="block-280acf36-2bda-47a6-aa79-2589aadf300e">温馨小提示：主题更新时记得备份哦！不然页面会消失的!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image" id="block-239060db-daee-4f12-ab86-da27be7e0e8f"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/a8c12535a2164625.jpg" alt="图片[6]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_7">添加底部统计信息模块小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>统计信息模块小工具主要采用前端HTML+CSS和后端函数，通过后端提供功能函数，然后前台获取到后台提供的数据来显示信息功能。有兴趣的大佬可以修改一下。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17469" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17469"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.在子比主题的主题目录下，header.php底部添加以下函数代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--统计信息函数-->
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//用户总数
$users = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM $wpdb->users");echo "var tj_jstext="."'$users'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
/*
 * WordPress获取今日发布文章数量
 *www.cunshao.com
 */
function nd_get_24h_post_count(){
  $today = getdate();
  $query = new WP_Query( 'year=' . $today["year"] . '&amp;monthnum=' . $today["mon"] . '&amp;day=' . $today["mday"]);
  $postsNumber = $query->found_posts;
  return $postsNumber;
}
$post_24h = nd_get_24h_post_count();
echo "var tj_24h="."'$post_24h'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
/*
 * WordPress整站文章访问计数
 *www.cunshao.com
 */
function nd_get_all_view(){
  global $wpdb;
  $count=0;
  $views= $wpdb->get_results("SELECT * FROM $wpdb->postmeta WHERE meta_key='views'");
  foreach($views as $key=>$value){
    $meta_value=$value->meta_value;
    if($meta_value!=' '){
      $count+=(int)$meta_value;
    }
  }return $count;
}
$post_view = nd_get_all_view();
echo "var tj_view="."'$post_view'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//日志总数
$count_posts = wp_count_posts(); 
$published_posts =$count_posts->publish;
echo "var tj_rzzs="."'$published_posts'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//稳定运行
$wdyx_time = floor((time()-strtotime("2020-3-28"))/86400);
echo "var tj_wdyx="."'$wdyx_time'";
?>
&lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>修改版PHP代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--调用信息代码-->
&lt;!--底部统计用的代码-->
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//用户总数
$users = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM $wpdb->users");echo "var tj_jstext="."'$users'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
/*
 * WordPress获取今日发布文章数量
 */
function nd_get_24h_post_count(){
  $today = getdate();
  $query = new WP_Query( 'year=' . $today["year"] . '&amp;monthnum=' . $today["mon"] . '&amp;day=' . $today["mday"]);
  $postsNumber = $query->found_posts;
  return $postsNumber;
}
$post_24h = nd_get_24h_post_count();
echo "var tj_24h="."'$post_24h'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
/*
 * WordPress整站文章访问计数
 */
function nd_get_all_view(){
  global $wpdb;
  $count=0;
  $views= $wpdb->get_results("SELECT * FROM $wpdb->postmeta WHERE meta_key='views'");
  foreach($views as $key=>$value){
    $meta_value=$value->meta_value;
    if($meta_value!=' '){
      $count+=(int)$meta_value;
    }
  }return $count;
}
$post_view = nd_get_all_view();
echo "var tj_view="."'$post_view'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//日志总数
$count_posts = wp_count_posts(); 
$published_posts =$count_posts->publish;
echo "var tj_rzzs="."'$published_posts'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
&lt;?php
//稳定运行
$wdyx_time = floor((time()-strtotime("2020-03-28"))/86400);
echo "var tj_wdyx="."'$wdyx_time'";
?>
&lt;/script>
&lt;!--调用信息代码结束--></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：函数运行日期2020-03-28改为你自己网站运行的日期。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2.在后台–&gt;外观–&gt;小工具–&gt;自定义HTML，把自定义HTML放到合适的版块里（子比主题放在首页-底部全宽度），然后把下面代码复制粘贴进去，即可在前台显示。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--信息统计开始-->
&lt;div id="nuandao">
    &lt;div class="siteCount">
      &lt;div class="wrapper">
        &lt;ul>
          &lt;li>
            &lt;span>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" >
document.write(tj_jstext);
&lt;/script>
&lt;/span>
            &lt;b>用户总数&lt;/b>
          &lt;/li>
          &lt;li>
            &lt;span>&lt;script type="text/javascript" >

&lt;/script>&lt;/span>

          &lt;/li>
        &lt;/ul>
        &lt;div class="join-vip">

         &lt;p>加入村少博客，快速获取优质IT资源！&lt;/p>

      &lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
  &lt;/div>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_8">文章标签美化</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>众所周知zibll子比主题是一个非常优秀的WordPress博客主题（本站也在采用本主题），但作者可能不怎么喜欢花里胡哨的文章标签，只优化了标签云显示彩色标签，文章标签没有进行彩色化（纯色）。而对于我这种喜欢花里胡哨的来说，只能自己动手，丰衣足食咯！O(∩_∩)O哈哈~<br>文章标签美化采用的是CSS覆盖原来的样式，达到彩色的效果！直接在后台主题自定义CSS样式粘贴CSS代码，这样升级主题时无需二次复制粘贴，简单、实用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17328" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17328"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>复制CSS代码到后台子比主题设置—》自定义CSS样式—》将CSS代码粘贴框里，即可大功告成。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章随机彩色标签*/
.article-tags{margin-bottom: 10px}.article-tags a{padding: 4px 10px;background-color: #19B5FE;color: white;font-size: 12px;line-height: 16px;font-weight: 400;margin: 0 5px 5px 0;border-radius: 2px;display: inline-block}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n){background-color: #4A4A4A;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+1){background-color: #ff5e5c;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+2){background-color: #ffbb50;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+3){background-color: #1ac756;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+4){background-color: #19B5FE;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:hover{background-color: #1B1B1B;color: #FFF}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：CSS代码已进行压缩，直接复制粘贴即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270723} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/198c509617174510.jpg" alt="图片[9]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270723"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_9">网站点击彩色效果</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>这一个很简单的网站点击彩色的效果，采用js来实现的，现在就分享给大家吧！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_10753" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_10753"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>首先创建JS文件，复制下面的代码，粘贴到文件中，然后用script标签调用：代码调用如：，就可以啦！Worderss主题一般都在后台主题设置里的自定义JS代码里添加，其他大同小异。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>JS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">function clickEffect() {
        let balls = [];
        let longPressed = false;
        let longPress;
        let multiplier = 0;
        let width, height;
        let origin;
        let normal;
        let ctx;
        const colours = ["#F73859", "#14FFEC", "#00E0FF", "#FF99FE", "#FAF15D"];
        const canvas = document.createElement("canvas");
        document.body.appendChild(canvas);
        canvas.setAttribute("style", "width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 99999; position: fixed; pointer-events: none;");
        const pointer = document.createElement("span");
        pointer.classList.add("pointer");
        document.body.appendChild(pointer);
    
        if (canvas.getContext &amp;&amp; window.addEventListener) {
            ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
            updateSize();
            window.addEventListener('resize', updateSize, false);
            loop();
            window.addEventListener("mousedown", function(e) {
                pushBalls(randBetween(10, 20), e.clientX, e.clientY);
                document.body.classList.add("is-pressed");
                longPress = setTimeout(function() {
                    document.body.classList.add("is-longpress");
                    longPressed = true;
                }, 500);
            }, false);
            window.addEventListener("mouseup", function(e) {
                clearInterval(longPress);
                if (longPressed == true) {
                    document.body.classList.remove("is-longpress");
                    pushBalls(randBetween(50 + Math.ceil(multiplier), 100 + Math.ceil(multiplier)), e.clientX, e.clientY);
                    longPressed = false;
                }
                document.body.classList.remove("is-pressed");
            }, false);
            window.addEventListener("mousemove", function(e) {
                let x = e.clientX;
                let y = e.clientY;
                pointer.style.top = y + "px";
                pointer.style.left = x + "px";
            }, false);
        } else {
            console.log("canvas or addEventListener is unsupported!");
        }
    
    
        function updateSize() {
            canvas.width = window.innerWidth * 2;
            canvas.height = window.innerHeight * 2;
            canvas.style.width = window.innerWidth + 'px';
            canvas.style.height = window.innerHeight + 'px';
            ctx.scale(2, 2);
            width = (canvas.width = window.innerWidth);
            height = (canvas.height = window.innerHeight);
            origin = {
                x: width / 2,
                y: height / 2
            };
            normal = {
                x: width / 2,
                y: height / 2
            };
        }
        class Ball {
            constructor(x = origin.x, y = origin.y) {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = y;
                this.angle = Math.PI * 2 * Math.random();
                if (longPressed == true) {
                    this.multiplier = randBetween(14 + multiplier, 15 + multiplier);
                } else {
                    this.multiplier = randBetween(6, 12);
                }
                this.vx = (this.multiplier + Math.random() * 0.5) * Math.cos(this.angle);
                this.vy = (this.multiplier + Math.random() * 0.5) * Math.sin(this.angle);
                this.r = randBetween(8, 12) + 3 * Math.random();
                this.color = colours[Math.floor(Math.random() * colours.length)];
            }
            update() {
                this.x += this.vx - normal.x;
                this.y += this.vy - normal.y;
                normal.x = -2 / window.innerWidth * Math.sin(this.angle);
                normal.y = -2 / window.innerHeight * Math.cos(this.angle);
                this.r -= 0.3;
                this.vx *= 0.9;
                this.vy *= 0.9;
            }
        }
    
        function pushBalls(count = 1, x = origin.x, y = origin.y) {
            for (let i = 0; i &lt; count; i++) {
                balls.push(new Ball(x, y));
            }
        }
    
        function randBetween(min, max) {
            return Math.floor(Math.random() * max) + min;
        }
    
        function loop() {
            ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)";
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            for (let i = 0; i &lt; balls.length; i++) {
                let b = balls[i];
                if (b.r &lt; 0) continue;
                ctx.fillStyle = b.color;
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.arc(b.x, b.y, b.r, 0, Math.PI * 2, false);
                ctx.fill();
                b.update();
            }
            if (longPressed == true) {
                multiplier += 0.2;
            } else if (!longPressed &amp;&amp; multiplier >= 0) {
                multiplier -= 0.4;
            }
            removeBall();
            requestAnimationFrame(loop);
        }
    
        function removeBall() {
            for (let i = 0; i &lt; balls.length; i++) {
                let b = balls[i];
                if (b.x + b.r &lt; 0 || b.x - b.r > width || b.y + b.r &lt; 0 || b.y - b.r > height || b.r &lt; 0) {
                    balls.splice(i, 1);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    clickEffect();</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>温馨提示：建议压缩JS代码后再使用，这样或许能使网站加载更快吧！O(∩_∩)O哈哈~</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270726} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/93d4170f7b174705.jpg" alt="图片[10]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270726"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_10">添加侧边彩色滚动条</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>WordPress默认的浏览器侧边栏滚动条是非常丑陋的，当然，有些WordPress主题是自带美化的侧边滚动栏不需要我们自己去美化，有些WordPress主题是没有美化侧边滚动栏的，那么这时就需要我们去美化啦！村少今天就教大家如何自定义美化侧边滚动栏。其实非常简单，只需一句代码的事情就可以自定义美化WordPress侧边滚动栏，并且代码适用于绝大多数WordPress主题。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16034" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16034"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一般主题都会自带 自定义代码 这样主题设置的，只需在主题设置自定义CSS代码里面添加美化的css代码就即可美化啦！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果主题没有 自定义代码 那么在WordPress主题目录文件里找style.css文件或者在WordPress后台里找“外观—&gt;自定义—&gt;额外CSS”里面美化的css代码就即可美！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>单色滚动条代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*滚动条显示样式*/  
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{
   background-color:#FF6666;  /*更改喜欢的十六进制颜色*/
   height:50px;  
   outline-offset:-2px;  
   outline:2px solid #fff;  
   -webkit-border-radius:4px;  
   border: 2px solid #fff;  
}  
/*滚动条大小*/ 
::-webkit-scrollbar{  
   width:8px;  
   height:8px;  
}  
/*滚动框背景样式*/  
::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece{  
   background-color:#fff;  
   -webkit-border-radius:0;  
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>彩色滚动条代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/**彩色滚动条样式*/
::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px;  
  height: 1px;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #12b7f5;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 50%, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    background: #f6f6f6;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">引用阿里巴巴矢量图标库彩色图标</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>现在大部分博客图标都采用Font Awesome图标库，因为Font Awesome图标库满足了大部分用户的需求了，但做为喜欢花里胡哨的我们是不够的，Font Awesome图标库的图标不仅没有彩色的图标，个性化的图标还有点少！所以对于我们喜欢彩色的菜单图标选择性很少！所以只能引入其他的矢量图标库，今天我就分享一下WordPress引用阿里巴巴矢量图标库的彩色图标。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18098" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18098"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>阿里巴巴矢量图标库网址：<a href="https://www.iconfont.cn/">https://www.iconfont.cn/</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>食用方法</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第一步：阿里巴巴矢量图标库官网 —&gt; Github或者新浪微博登录</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第二步：然后自己通过搜索框找到自己喜爱的图标并添加至购物车 —&gt; 添加至项目 //没有项目的自己新建项目</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第三步：跳转到我的项目 页面（没有跳转的点击–&gt;资源管理–&gt;我的项目）//我的项目自己创建名字</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第四步：在 我的项目 页面有一下按钮—&gt;一般选 Symbol</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第五步：点击 –&gt; 查看在线链接（没有的的话可以点击生成链接） —&gt;点此复制代码（代码例如下面）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//at.alicdn.com/t/font_2101442_j448m0ggtp.js</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第六步：引入JS代码</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在当前主题设置—&gt;自定义JS代码 添加下面代码:(下面src=”这里是上面的JS代码，自行替换”)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;script src="//at.alicdn.com/t/font_2101442_j448m0ggtp.js">&lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第七步：添加css样式</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在当前主题设置 –&gt; 自定义CSS代码 或者目录下的 header.php 文件中适当位置添加以下代码:（不适用的，自行调整宽度）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;style type="text/css">
.icon {
    width: 1em; height: 1em;
    vertical-align: -0.15em;
    fill: currentColor;
    overflow: hidden;
}
&lt;/style></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第八步：添加彩色图标</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一、在WordPress后台—&gt; 外观 —&gt; 菜单 —&gt; 导航标签 添加以下代码:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;svg class="icon fa-spin" aria-hidden="true">&lt;use xlink:href="#iconziyuan">&lt;/use>&lt;/svg> 文章分类</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>二、上面的 iconziyuan 对应图标代码 //就是图库下面的图标名称</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>配合一行代码让你网站菜单图标旋转起来</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在自己网站主题的CSS中加入以下代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">.fa-spin {
    animation: 2s linear 0s normal none infinite running fa-spin;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在WordPress后台，将“fa-spin”添加到菜单中要旋转的图标代码的“class”中。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;svg class="icon fa-spin" aria-hidden="true">&lt;use xlink:href="#iconziyuan">&lt;/use>&lt;/svg> 文章分类</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：本站采用的是“子比”主题，主题自带CSS代码了，如果你Wordpress也是采用“子比”主题那么只需添加 JS代码 和 导航标签 即可！！！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270727} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/4ff33afcc1175558.gif" alt="图片[11]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270727"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_12">首页文章点击更多按钮样式美化</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_12011" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_12011"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/点击更多/
.theme-pagination .ajax-next a, .theme-pagination .order-ajax-next a{border-radius: 30px; padding: 15px 0; color: var(--muted-color); background-color:var(--main-bg-color);color: #FF0033;display: block;opacity: 1;font-weight:bold;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270730} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/dc597b9269175705.jpg" alt="图片[12]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270730"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/* logo扫光 */
.navbar-brand{position:relative;overflow:hidden;margin: 0px 0 0 0px;}.navbar-brand:before{content:""; position: absolute; left: -665px; top: -460px; width: 200px; height: 15px; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.5); -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg); -moz-transform: rotate(-45deg); -ms-transform: rotate(-45deg); -o-transform: rotate(-45deg); transform: rotate(-45deg); -webkit-animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite; -o-animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite; animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite;}@-moz-keyframes searchLights{50%{left: -100px; top: 0;} 65%{left: 120px; top: 100px;}}@keyframes searchLights{40%{left: -100px; top: 0;} 60%{left: 120px; top: 100px;} 80%{left: -100px; top: 0px;}}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>

.avatar{border-radius: 50%; animation: light 4s ease-in-out infinite; transition: 0.5s;}.avatar:hover{transform: scale(1.15) rotate(720deg);}@keyframes light{0%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #f00;} 25%{box-shadow: 0 0 16px #0f0;} 50%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #00f;} 75%{box-shadow: 0 0 16px #0f0;} 100%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #f00;}}</code></pre>

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

@media screen and (min-width: 980px){.tab-content .posts-item:not(article){transition: all 0.3s;}.tab-content .posts-item:not(article):hover{transform: translateY(-10px); box-shadow: 0 8px 10px rgba(255, 112, 173, 0.35);}}</code></pre>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_17">设置网站动态标题</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>我们经常逛别人的网站，有些网站当我们离开该页面浏览其他页面的时候，我们在离开的页面上面会看到比如本站的“你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ”这样的字样，当我们点回来的时候页面上面会看到“(/≧▽≦/)你又回来了！”的字样。那么我们如何实现呢？其实很简单，只需一句javascript语句即可实现。请看下面的教程。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18569" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18569"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>（以子比主题最新版为例）在后台主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义javascript代码把下面的代码添加到里面即可实现。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//动态标题 
var OriginTitile = document.title,
titleTime;
document.addEventListener("visibilitychange",
function() {
    if (document.hidden) {
        document.title = "你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ";
        clearTimeout(titleTime)
    } else {
        document.title = "(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！ " ;
        titleTime = setTimeout(function() {
            document.title = OriginTitile
        },
        2000)
    }
});</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：代码中“你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ”和“(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！”可自行修改成自己喜欢的标题文字。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果你的网站主题设置没有自定义javascript代码这个框的话，若有自定义头部HTML代码的话，把下面的代码添加到里面也可实现。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>或者在首页文件位于“”标签之前添加下面的代码也可以。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;script type="text/javascript">
      /*  动态标题*/
     var OriginTitile = document.title,
      titleTime;
     document.addEventListener("visibilitychange",
     function() {
      if (document.hidden) {
        document.title = "你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ";
        clearTimeout(titleTime)
    } else {
        document.title = "(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！" ;
        titleTime = setTimeout(function() {
            document.title = OriginTitile
        },
        2000)
    }
    });
    &lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：代码中“你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ”和“(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！”可自行修改成自己喜欢的标题文字。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270738} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/642823e27c181153.jpg" alt="图片[16]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270738"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_18">添加鼠标样式</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16635" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16635"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：（本站的样式）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group=""> /** 鼠标样式 开始**/
/** 普通指针样式**/
body{cursor: url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/5ccab616ea9c8.cur), default;}
/** 链接指针样式**/
a:hover{cursor:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/5ccab63d8fc80.cur), pointer;}
/** 鼠标样式 结束**/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>网友投稿的鼠标样式：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*鼠标指针样式*/ 
body{cursor:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/normal1.png), default;}
a:hover{cursor:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/link1.png), pointer;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_19">首页主内容上方添加跑马灯公告小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18216" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18216"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>网站后台—&gt;外观—&gt;小工具—&gt;自定义HTML，然后添加到合适位置集合即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--跑马灯公告-->
&lt;style>
  #nr{font-size:20px; margin: 0; background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #ffffff, #ff0000 6.25%, #ff7d00 12.5%, #ffff00 18.75%, #00ff00 25%, #00ffff 31.25%, #0000ff 37.5%, #ff00ff 43.75%, #ffff00 50%, #ff0000 56.25%, #ff7d00 62.5%, #ffff00 68.75%, #00ff00 75%, #00ffff 81.25%, #0000ff 87.5%, #ff00ff 93.75%, #ffff00 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-size: 200% 100%; animation: masked-animation 2s infinite linear;} @keyframes masked-animation{0%{background-position: 0 0;} 100%{background-position: -100%, 0;} }
&lt;/style>
    &lt;div style="background-color:#333;border-radius:25px;box-shadow:0px 0px 5px #f200ff;padding:5px;margin-bottom:0px;">
        &lt;marquee>
        &lt;b id="nr">欢迎来到村少博客 - 网络IT科技魅力博客。&lt;/b> &lt;/marquee>
    &lt;/div></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270739} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/a3b10aafc3194826.jpg" alt="图片[17]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270739"/></figure>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_20">首页文章列表浮出</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14477" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14477"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*列表依次进入*/
posts{display: none}.fadeIn{display: block; animation: fadeIn 3s;}@keyframes fadeIn{0%{opacity: 0; transform: translate3d(0, 50px, 0);} 100%{opacity: 1; transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);}}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>javascript代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">// 列表依次进入
let lis = $('posts');
Array.from(lis).forEach((item, index) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        $(item).addClass('fadeIn');
    }, 150 * index);
});</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>两个都要添加</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_21">添加复制提示框</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11251" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11251"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>javascript代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//复制提示
document.body.oncopy = function(){Swal.fire({allowOutsideClick:false,type:'success',title: '复制成功,如转载请注明出处！',showConfirmButton: false,timer: 2000});};</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>子比主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义底部HTML代码,添加以下代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@8">&lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270740} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/8773921b8a195039.jpg" alt="图片[18]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270740"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_22">顶部添加彩色进度条</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16121" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16121"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*进度条加载显示*/
#percentageCounter{position:fixed; left:0; top:0; height:3px; z-index:99999; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #339933,#FF6666);border-radius:5px;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>javascript代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//进度条加载显示
$(window).scroll(function() {
    var a = $(window).scrollTop(),
    c = $(document).height(),
    b = $(window).height();
    scrollPercent = a / (c - b) * 100;
    scrollPercent = scrollPercent.toFixed(1);
    $("#percentageCounter").css({
        width: scrollPercent + "%"
    });
}).trigger("scroll");</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在主题目录header.php中，添加以下代码，放在body标签下（最后一行）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;div id="percentageCounter">&lt;/div></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_23">文章添加版权声明</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_10009" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_10009"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在子比主题设置—&gt;文章&amp;列表—&gt;文章页—&gt;版权提示内容处添加以下代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;div>
  &lt;!--网站声明代码start-->
  &lt;div>
    &lt;fieldset
      style="
        border: 1px dashed #008cff;
        padding: 10px;
        border-radius: 5px;
        line-height: 2em;
        color: #6d6d6d;
      "
    >
      &lt;legend
        align="center"
        style="
          width: 30%;
          text-align: center;
          background-color: #008cff;
          border-radius: 5px;
         background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #FFCC99, #FF99CC); text-align:center;" 
        "
      >
        文章版权声明
      &lt;/legend>
      1、本网站名称：&lt;span style="color: #3333ff"
        >&lt;span style="color: #FF6666; font-size: 18px"
          >&lt;strong>荔枝博客&lt;/strong>&lt;/span
        >&lt;/span
      >&lt;br />
      2、本站永久网址：&lt;font color="#FF6666">https://woax.cn/&lt;/font
      >&lt;br />
      3、本网站的文章部分内容可能来源于网络，仅供大家学习与参考，如有侵权，请联系站长QQ37710566进行删除处理。&lt;br />
      4、本站一切资源不代表本站立场，并不代表本站赞同其观点和对其真实性负责。&lt;br />
      5、本站一律禁止以任何方式发布或转载任何违法的相关信息，访客发现请向站长举报&lt;br />
      6、本站资源大多存储在云盘，如发现链接失效，请联系我们我们会第一时间更新。&lt;br />
    &lt;/fieldset>
  &lt;/div>
  &lt;!--网站声明代码end-->&lt;br />
&lt;/div></code></pre>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_24">底部可爱底线提示</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15732" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15732"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在主题目录—&gt;footer.php的“&lt;footer class….&gt;”上方加入以下代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--底部可爱底线提示-->
&lt;div class="app_normal window" style="padding-top:" data-reactroot="">&lt;div class="common_container lastpagenotice_noticewrap">&lt;img src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/lan.png" data-spm-anchor-id="a2ha1.14919748_WEBHOME_GRAY.0.i1">&lt;div class="lastpagenotice_text"  style="color:#6699FF;font-weight:bold;">我也是有底线哒~&lt;/div>&lt;div class="lastpagenotice_line">&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*底部可爱底线提示*/
.lastpagenotice_noticewrap{color:hsla(0, 2.1%, 18.8%, 0.6);}.lastpagenotice_noticewrap img{height:73px; width:88px; margin:0 auto}.lastpagenotice_noticewrap .lastpagenotice_text{display:block; position:absolute; font-size:15px; line-height:20px; top:50%; -webkit-transform:translateY(-50%); -ms-transform:translateY(-50%); transform:translateY(-50%); left:-webkit-calc(50% + 60px); left:calc(50% + 60px)}.lastpagenotice_noticewrap .lastpagenotice_line{width:100%; height:1px; background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.05); position:absolute; bottom:0}.app_normal{text-align:center; position:relative}</code></pre>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_25">文章页面添加文章字数和阅读时间</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16281" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16281"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、在主题目录下functions.php文件把下面的代码添加进去：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//  文章字数和阅读时间
function count_words_read_time () {
  global $post;
  $text_num = mb_strlen(preg_replace('/s/','',html_entity_decode(strip_tags($post->post_content))),'UTF-8');
  $read_time = ceil($text_num/300); // 修改数字300调整时间
  $output .= '共计' . $text_num . '字，阅读大约' . $read_time  . '分钟。';
  return $output;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、在主题目录zibll/inc/functions/zib-single.php,把下面代码添加到132行处（如下图）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--文章字数和阅读时间-->&lt;i class="fa fa-hourglass-start">&lt;/i> &lt;?php echo count_words_read_time(); ?></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1099,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313121513328.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1099"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：（必看）文章字数和阅读时间都不是很准，同时用处也不是很大…喜欢的话自己拿去试试吧！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270747} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/087e83a2ef202347.jpg" alt="图片[22]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270747"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_26">顶部导航栏添加背景图片</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16220" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16220"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*导航栏图片背景*/
.header-layout-1{position:relative;background-image:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/huacao.png);background-position:center right;background-size:auto 100%;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：图片背景是透明的，然后我自己乱搞的花花，你可以自己弄更好看的图片，图片大小是1800<em>80、2000</em>80（后这者感觉可能优于前者，O(∩_∩)O哈哈~）</p>

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_27">底部添加蓝色波浪</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17742" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17742"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在zibll主题目录下，footer.php文件中的“&lt;/footer&gt;”（重要）下面添加下面的代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--底部波浪开始-->
&lt;div class="wiiuii_layout">
&lt;svg class="editorial"
     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
     xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
     viewBox="0 24 150 28"
     preserveAspectRatio="none">
 &lt;defs>
 &lt;path id="gentle-wave"
 d="M-160 44c30 0 
    58-18 88-18s
    58 18 88 18 
    58-18 88-18 
    58 18 88 18
    v44h-352z" />
  &lt;/defs>
  &lt;g class="parallax">
   &lt;use xlink:href="#gentle-wave" x="50" y="0" fill="#4579e2"/>
   &lt;use xlink:href="#gentle-wave" x="50" y="3" fill="#3461c1"/>
   &lt;use xlink:href="#gentle-wave" x="50" y="6" fill="#2d55aa"/>  
  &lt;/g>
&lt;/svg>
&lt;/div>
&lt;style type='text/css'>
.parallax > use{animation: move-forever 12s linear infinite;}.parallax > use:nth-child(1){animation-delay: -2s;}.parallax > use:nth-child(2){animation-delay: -2s; animation-duration: 5s;}.parallax > use:nth-child(3){animation-delay: -4s; animation-duration: 3s;}@keyframes move-forever{0%{transform: translate(-90px, 0%);} 100%{transform: translate(85px, 0%);}}.wiiuii_layout{width: 100%;height: 40px;position: relative;overflow: hidden;z-index: 1;background: var(--footer-bg);}.editorial{display: block; width: 100%; height: 40px; margin: 0;}
&lt;/style>
&lt;!--底部波浪结束--></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270749} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/78739bd2d7203004.jpg" alt="图片[24]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270749"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_28">回到顶部悬挂猫咪</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>回到顶部悬挂猫咪是今天我从网上看到觉得很不错，然后就弄到了本站，确实很棒。话不多说，下面分享教程！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15135" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15135"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>本教程以本站使用的子比主题为例，大部分主题大同小异。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>回到顶部悬挂猫咪采用js+css+Jquery,但大多数的WordPress主题都已经使用Jquery，所以无需担心Jquery问题（当然啦，如果主题没有Jquery，那么去百度找Jquery好用的CDN进行调用。）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、首先，下载回到顶部悬挂猫咪的JS+CSS（在本文章末）。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、两种方式：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在网站后台—&gt;主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义头部HTML代码，把下面的代码添加进去；</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>回到顶部悬挂猫咪只能电脑端显示，需要手机端显示，自己修改CSS代码。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1100,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313122121990.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1100"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果没有自定义头部HTML代码那么的主题，请在主题目录下header.php末尾添加下面的代码。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1101,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313122147602.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1101"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--回到顶部-->
&lt;link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/szgotop.css" />
&lt;div class="back-to-top cd-top faa-float animated cd-is-visible" style="top: -900px;">&lt;/div>
&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/szgotop.js">&lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注（非常重要）：自己把得到CSS、JS文件放在喜欢的目录里面，或者在自己网站根目录下创建新的目录把文件放进去（嘿嘿嘿，实在实在是不会的自己花钱弄），然后在href=”文件路径”和src=”文件路径”填写自己的文件路径。悬挂猫咪是一张图片，还需要在CSS里面修改图片的路径（图片路径在CSS最后面，见下图）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1102,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313122323874.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1102"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、前两步如果都完成了，那么在网站首页拉到底部就可以看到了悬挂猫咪，那么这时候就会出现“主题自带的回到顶部”和悬挂猫咪，那么需要我们到网站后台—&gt;主题设置里面关闭主题自带的回到顶部，其他主题的主题设置不知道有没有关闭这一项。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>子比主题只需在网站后台—&gt;主题设置—&gt;全局&amp;功能—&gt;常用功能—&gt;返回顶部按钮—&gt;关闭电脑端的回到顶部。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1103,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313122534108.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1103"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270753} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/51c8277693203332.jpg" alt="图片[29]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270753"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_29">添加说说页面（清新版）</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>WordPress添加说说页面百度上有很多这样的页面教程，有些大佬制作的说说页面非常好，这也使我制作清新版说说页面受益良多。本来我也不想制作这样页面，毕竟百度上一大堆教程，而且用处也不是很大。但是我在使用那些大佬制作好的说说页面，有些存在一些小BUG（可能不适配本站主题的原因）,所以我自己制作了一个清新版说说页面（当然啦，大部分代码都是借鉴和使用大佬的），花了2天的时间制作完成（主要花很多时间修改很多种的样式）。自己对于PHP、HTML和CSS不是很了解（萌新一枚），所以在制作的过程中出现很多的问题，比如：在制作完成后突然发现不能分页，这是恐怖的事，不过被我解决了，同时也优化了说说页面，使说说页面可以发布很多的东西，比如视频等等啥的…<br>本来想加评论但是我对WordPress和本站的子比主题的函数，不是很了解（也不怎么会加），所以弄不了，这是很遗憾的，如果有大佬知道弄的话，请告知一下我。教程代码不是太美观，请勿喷，谢谢。O(∩_∩)O哈哈~好啦！下面给出教程。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19628" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19628"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>虽然说说页面我只制作适配本站主题，但是主体的代码还是能用的，其他主题只需复制主题下的页面默认模板文件，然后在合适的位置添加本说说页面的核心代码，即可使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>由于通过本站文章微语页面的函数代码进行修改，使用如果使用微语页面的朋友，请先删除functions.php中的函数，在进行以下步骤。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>更新主题是记得备份代码，以免无法使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>有一些CSS样式是直接采用子比主题的CSS，所以其他主题使用过程中出现样式的问题请自行修改一些CSS样式。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说说页面的点赞不是主题的代码，所以会存在一个Bug，如果介意请自己删除相关代码。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、在主题目录下functions.php文件末尾把下面代码添加进去即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//说说
add_action('init', 'my_custom_init'); function my_custom_init() { $labels = array( 'name' => '说说', 'singular_name' => 'singularname', 'add_new' => '发表说说', 'add_new_item' => '发表说说', 'edit_item' => '编辑说说', 'new_item' => '新说说', 'view_item' => '查看说说', 'search_items' => '搜索说说', 'not_found' => '暂无说说', 'not_found_in_trash' => '没有已遗弃的说说', 'parent_item_colon' => '', 'menu_name' => '说说' ); $args = array( 'labels' => $labels, 'public' => true, 'publicly_queryable' => true, 'show_ui' => true, 'show_in_menu' => true, 'query_var' => true, 'rewrite' => true, 'capability_type' => 'post', 'has_archive' => true, 'hierarchical' => false, 'menu_position' => null, 'supports' => array('title','editor','author','custom-fields','comments') ); register_post_type('shuoshuo',$args); }
 //指定说说文章模板
add_filter( 'template_include', 'include_template_function', 1 );
function include_template_function( $template_path ) {
    if ( get_post_type() == 'shuoshuo' ) {
        if ( is_single() ) {
            if ( $theme_file = locate_template( array ( 'shuoshuo.php' ) ) ) {
                $template_path = $theme_file;
            } else {
                $template_path = plugin_dir_path( __FILE__ ) . '/pages/shuoshuo.php';//自己修改文件路径
            }
        }
    }
    return $template_path;
}
/*说说点赞功能*/
add_action('wp_ajax_nopriv_bigfa_like', 'bigfa_like');
add_action('wp_ajax_bigfa_like', 'bigfa_like');
function bigfa_like(){
    global $wpdb,$post;
    $id = $_POST["um_id"];
    $action = $_POST["um_action"];
    if ( $action == 'ding'){
    $bigfa_raters = get_post_meta($id,'bigfa_ding',true);
    $expire = time() + 99999999;
    $domain = ($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'] != 'localhost') ? $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'] : false; // make cookies work with localhost
    setcookie('bigfa_ding_'.$id,$id,$expire,'/',$domain,false);
    if (!$bigfa_raters || !is_numeric($bigfa_raters)) {
        update_post_meta($id, 'bigfa_ding', 1);
    } 
    else {
            update_post_meta($id, 'bigfa_ding', ($bigfa_raters + 1));
        }
    echo get_post_meta($id,'bigfa_ding',true);
    } 
    die;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>子比主题的朋友，在主题目录zibll/pages目录下创建shuoshuo.php文件,然后把下面的代码复制进去即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果懒得创建文件，可以下载使用本站已经创建好PHP文件，文件下载在文章末尾。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>子比主题说说页面代码↓</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>版本一：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php

/**
 * Template name: 说说页面
 * Description:   shuoshuo
 */

// 获取链接列表
get_header();
$header_style = zib_get_page_header_style();
?>

    &lt;div class="content-wrap">
        &lt;div class="content-layout">
            &lt;?php while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
                &lt;?php if ($header_style != 1) {
                    echo zib_get_page_header();
                } ?>
                &lt;?php endwhile;  ?>
                &lt;div class="box-body theme-box radius8 main-bg main-shadow">
                    &lt;?php if ($header_style == 1) {
                        echo zib_get_page_header();
                    } ?>
                &lt;!--说说主体开始www.cunshao.com-->
                &lt;style type="text/css">

font-family: microsoft yahei;}#article ul{padding-left:0px!important;}#article li{padding:5px!important;color: var(--main-color);}#article img{border-radius: 5px;} #article p{color:var(--main-color);}#article video{border-radius: 5px;}.typebox{box-shadow:0px 1px 6px 0.01px #9999993d;padding:10px;margin-bottom:20px;border-radius:8px;}.typeafter{margin-right:-15px;margin-left:-15px;margin-top:-20px;}.wiiuii-avatar img{border-radius: 50%;width:50px;height:50px;}.wiiuii-avatar{float:left;position:relative;min-height:1px;padding: 0px 15px 10px 15px;}.wiiuii-hr{border-top: 2px dashed rgba(255,78,106,.85);margin: 0 0 0;}.wiiuii-content{positiON: relative;}.wiiuii-content .shuoshuo-icon{position: absolute;right: 1px;display: block;width: 40px;height: 40px;line-height: 20px;background-image: url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/%E8%AF%B4.svg);transform-origin: 0% 0%;}/*www.cunshao.com*/#wiiuii-content{background-color: rgba(255,78,106,.15); margin: 4px 2px; -webkit-transition-duration: 0.4s; transition-duration: 0.4s; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 10px!important;} .button1{background-color: var(--main-bg-color); color:#2997f7; border: 2px solid #2997f7;} .button1:hover{background-color: #2997f7; color: white;}.aligncenter {clear: both;display: block;margin: 0 auto;}.alignright{display: block;margin-left: auto;}.wiiuii_frame{padding: 0 10px 0 10px;}

                 .post-like{text-align:center;padding:10px} .post-like a{background-color: #2997f7; border-radius: 10px; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 15px; padding: 8px 10px; text-decoration: none; outline: none;}.post-like a.done, .post-like a:hover{background-color: #F44336; color: #ffffff;} .post-like a.done{cursor:not-allowed}
                &lt;/style>

                 &lt;script type="text/javascript">
                    $.fn.postLike=function(){if($(this).hasClass('done')){return false}else{$(this).addClass('done');var id=$(this).data("id"),action=$(this).data('action'),rateHolder=$(this).children('.count');var ajax_data={action:"bigfa_like",um_id:id,um_action:action};$.post("/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php",ajax_data,function(data){$(rateHolder).html(data)});return false}};$(document).on("click",".favorite",function(){$(this).postLike()});
                &lt;/script>
                &lt;/head>
                &lt;body>
                &lt;h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">&lt;strong>说说列表:&lt;/strong>&lt;/h1>

                &lt;/br>
                &lt;div class="wiiuii-content">
                &lt;ul>
                    &lt;?php $limit = get_option('posts_per_page');$paged = (get_query_var('paged')) ? get_query_var('paged') : 1;  
                    query_posts('post_type=shuoshuo&amp;post_status=publish&amp;showposts=' . $limit=6 . '&amp;paged=' . $paged);if (have_posts()) : while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>版本二：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--说说主体开始www.cunshao.com-->

                            &lt;/div>
                            &lt;/div>

                                    &lt;h2>&lt;?php the_title();?>&lt;/h2>
                                &lt;/div>
