                                    &lt;div id="wiiuii-bt">
                                    &lt;?php the_content(); ?>
                                    &lt;/div>
                                &lt;/div>
                            &lt;/div>
                            &lt;!--点赞功能开始-->
                            &lt;div class="post-like">
                                &lt;a href="javascript:;" data-action="ding" data-id="&lt;?php the_ID(); ?>" class="favorite&lt;?php if(isset($_COOKIE['bigfa_ding_'.$post->ID])) echo ' done';?>">&lt;i class="fa fa-heart" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 喜欢(&lt;span class="count">&lt;?php if( get_post_meta($post->ID,'bigfa_ding',true) ){ echo get_post_meta($post->ID,'bigfa_ding',true);} else { echo '0';}?>&lt;/span>)
                                &lt;/a>
                                &lt;/div>
                            &lt;/div>
                            &lt;!---->
                        &lt;?php endwhile;endif; ?>
                    &lt;/li>
                &lt;/ul>
                &lt;!--分页功能-->
                &lt;div class="wiiuii-fenye" style="text-align:center;font-weight:700;">
                &lt;?php if (function_exists('wp_pagenavi')) wp_pagenavi();else { ?>&lt;div style="padding: 8px;">&lt;?php previous_posts_link('&lt;button class="button button1">&lt;i class="fa fa-caret-left" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 上一页&lt;/button>') ?>  &lt;?php next_posts_link('&lt;button class="button button1">下一页 &lt;i class="fa fa-caret-right" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i>&lt;/button>') ?>&lt;/div>&lt;?php } ?>
                &lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>
                &lt;!--说说主体结束www.9o4.cn--></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、在网站后台—&gt;页面—&gt;新建页面—&gt;页面属性–模板–WIIUII说说页面（古腾堡编辑器是这样的，不知道经典编辑器是不是一样），然后发布页面即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:gallery {"linkTo":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-gallery has-nested-images columns-default is-cropped"><!-- wp:image {"id":270755} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/be5a1b519c211625.jpg" alt="图片[30]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270755"/><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">版本一</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1104,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313123308940.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1104"/><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">版本二</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></figure>
<!-- /wp:gallery -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_30">修改go外链跳转页面</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19152" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19152"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在主题目录下go.php文件里面的全部代码清空，然后把下面的代码复制进去即可。替换原来的即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>更新主题和修改前记得备份go.php。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>样式一、</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php 
/*
 * @Author        : Qinver
 * @Url           : zibll.com
 * @Date          : 2020-09-29 13:18:36
 * @LastEditTime  : 2020-10-08 17:42:52
 * @Email         : 770349780@qq.com
 * @Project       : Zibll子比主题
 * @Description   : 一款极其优雅的Wordpress主题
 * @Read me       : 感谢您使用子比主题，主题源码有详细的注释，支持二次开发。欢迎各位朋友与我相互交流。
 * @Remind        : 使用盗版主题会存在各种未知风险。支持正版，从我做起！
 */

if(strlen($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']) > 384 ||
    strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "eval(") ||
  strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "base64")) {
    @header("HTTP/1.1 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Status: 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Connection: Close");
    @exit;
}
//通过QUERY_STRING取得完整的传入数据，然后取得url=之后的所有值，兼容性更好
$t_url = preg_replace('/^url=(.*)$/i','$1',$_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);

//数据处理
if(!empty($t_url)) {
    //判断取值是否加密
    if ($t_url == base64_encode(base64_decode($t_url))) {
        $t_url =  base64_decode($t_url);
    }
    //对取值进行网址校验和判断
    preg_match('/^(http|https|thunder|qqdl|ed2k|Flashget|qbrowser):\/\//i',$t_url,$matches);
  if($matches){
      $url=$t_url;
      $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
  } else {
      preg_match('/\./i',$t_url,$matche);
      if($matche){
          $url='http://'.$t_url;
          $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
      } else {
          $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
          $title='参数错误，正在返回首页...';
      }
  }
} else {
    $title = '参数缺失，正在返回首页...';
    $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
}
?>
&lt;html>
&lt;head>
&lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
&lt;meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
&lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0">
&lt;noscript>&lt;meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1;url='&lt;?php echo $url;?>';">&lt;/noscript>
&lt;script>
function link_jump()
{
    //禁止其他网站使用我们的跳转页面
    var MyHOST = new RegExp("&lt;?php echo $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; ?>");
    if (!MyHOST.test(document.referrer)) {
         location.href="http://" + MyHOST;
    }
    location.href="&lt;?php echo $url;?>";
}
//延时1S跳转，可自行修改延时时间
setTimeout(link_jump, 1500);
//延时50S关闭跳转页面，用于文件下载后不会关闭跳转页的问题
setTimeout(function(){window.opener=null;window.close();}, 50000);
&lt;/script>
&lt;title>&lt;?php echo $title;?>&lt;/title>

&lt;style>html{height:100%;min-height:100%;overflow:hidden}html body{background:#222428;background-size:163px;font:14px/21px Monaco,sans-serif;color:#999;font-smoothing:antialiased;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%;-moz-text-size-adjust:100%;-ms-text-size-adjust:100%;text-size-adjust:100%;height:100%;min-height:100%}html body a,html body a:visited{text-decoration:none;color:#ff805f}html body h4{margin:0;color:#666}.scene{width:100%;height:100%;-webkit-perspective:600;perspective:600;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.scene svg{width:240px;height:240px}.dc-logo{position:fixed;right:10px;bottom:10px}.dc-logo:hover svg{-webkit-transform-origin:50% 50%;transform-origin:50% 50%;-webkit-animation:arrow-spin 2.5s 0s cubic-bezier(0.165,0.84,0.44,1) infinite;animation:arrow-spin 2.5s 0s cubic-bezier(0.165,0.84,0.44,1) infinite}.dc-logo:hover:hover:before{content:'\2764';padding:6px;font:10px/1 Monaco,sans-serif;font-size:10px;color:#00fffe;text-transform:uppercase;position:absolute;left:-70px;top:-30px;white-space:nowrap;z-index:20px;box-shadow:0 0 4px #222;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.4)}.dc-logo:hover:hover:after{content:'Digital Craft';padding:6px;font:10px/1 Monaco,sans-serif;font-size:10px;color:#6e6f71;text-transform:uppercase;position:absolute;right:0;top:-30px;white-space:nowrap;z-index:20px;box-shadow:0 0 4px #222;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.4);background-image:none}@-webkit-keyframes arrow-spin{50%{-webkit-transform:rotateY(360deg);transform:rotateY(360deg)}}@keyframes arrow-spin{50%{-webkit-transform:rotateY(360deg);transform:rotateY(360deg)}}&lt;/style>
&lt;/head>
&lt;body>
 
&lt;div class="scene">
  &lt;svg version="1.1" id="dc-spinner" x="0px" y="0px" width:"38"="" height:"38"="" viewBox="0 0 38 38" preserveAspectRatio="xMinYMin meet">
    &lt;text x="14" y="21" font-family="Monaco" font-size="2px" style="letter-spacing:0.6" fill="grey">加载中...
      &lt;animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;1;0" dur="1.8s" repeatCount="indefinite">&lt;/animate>
    &lt;/text>
    &lt;path fill="#373a42" d="M20,35c-8.271,0-15-6.729-15-15S11.729,5,20,5s15,6.729,15,15S28.271,35,20,35z M20,5.203
      C11.841,5.203,5.203,11.841,5.203,20c0,8.159,6.638,14.797,14.797,14.797S34.797,28.159,34.797,20
      C34.797,11.841,28.159,5.203,20,5.203z">
    &lt;/path>
 
    &lt;path fill="#373a42" d="M20,33.125c-7.237,0-13.125-5.888-13.125-13.125S12.763,6.875,20,6.875S33.125,12.763,33.125,20
      S27.237,33.125,20,33.125z M20,7.078C12.875,7.078,7.078,12.875,7.078,20c0,7.125,5.797,12.922,12.922,12.922
      S32.922,27.125,32.922,20C32.922,12.875,27.125,7.078,20,7.078z">
    &lt;/path>
 
    &lt;path fill="#2AA198" stroke="#2AA198" stroke-width="0.6027" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M5.203,20
      c0-8.159,6.638-14.797,14.797-14.797V5C11.729,5,5,11.729,5,20s6.729,15,15,15v-0.203C11.841,34.797,5.203,28.159,5.203,20z">
      &lt;animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 20 20" to="360 20 20" calcMode="spline" keySplines="0.4, 0, 0.2, 1" keyTimes="0;1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite">&lt;/animateTransform>
    &lt;/path>
 
    &lt;path fill="#859900" stroke="#859900" stroke-width="0.2027" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M7.078,20
      c0-7.125,5.797-12.922,12.922-12.922V6.875C12.763,6.875,6.875,12.763,6.875,20S12.763,33.125,20,33.125v-0.203
       C12.875,32.922,7.078,27.125,7.078,20z">
      &lt;animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="rotate" from="0 20 20" to="360 20 20" dur="1.8s" repeatCount="indefinite">&lt;/animateTransform>
    &lt;/path>
  &lt;/svg>
&lt;/div>
&lt;/body>
&lt;/html></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>样式二、</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php 
/*
 * @Author        : Qinver
 * @Url           : zibll.com
 * @Date          : 2020-09-29 13:18:36
 * @LastEditTime  : 2020-10-08 17:42:52
 * @Email         : 770349780@qq.com
 * @Project       : Zibll子比主题
 * @Description   : 一款极其优雅的Wordpress主题
 * @Read me       : 感谢您使用子比主题，主题源码有详细的注释，支持二次开发。欢迎各位朋友与我相互交流。
 * @Remind        : 使用盗版主题会存在各种未知风险。支持正版，从我做起！
 */

if(strlen($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']) > 384 ||
    strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "eval(") ||
  strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "base64")) {
    @header("HTTP/1.1 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Status: 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Connection: Close");
    @exit;
}
//通过QUERY_STRING取得完整的传入数据，然后取得url=之后的所有值，兼容性更好
$t_url = preg_replace('/^url=(.*)$/i','$1',$_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);

//数据处理
if(!empty($t_url)) {
    //判断取值是否加密
    if ($t_url == base64_encode(base64_decode($t_url))) {
        $t_url =  base64_decode($t_url);
    }
    //对取值进行网址校验和判断
    preg_match('/^(http|https|thunder|qqdl|ed2k|Flashget|qbrowser):\/\//i',$t_url,$matches);
  if($matches){
      $url=$t_url;
      $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
  } else {
      preg_match('/\./i',$t_url,$matche);
      if($matche){
          $url='http://'.$t_url;
          $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
      } else {
          $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
          $title='参数错误，正在返回首页...';
      }
  }
} else {
    $title = '参数缺失，正在返回首页...';
    $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
}
?>
&lt;html>
&lt;head>
&lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
&lt;meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
&lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0">
&lt;noscript>&lt;meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1;url='&lt;?php echo $url;?>';">&lt;/noscript>
&lt;script>
function link_jump()
{
    //禁止其他网站使用我们的跳转页面
    var MyHOST = new RegExp("&lt;?php echo $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; ?>");
    if (!MyHOST.test(document.referrer)) {
         location.href="http://" + MyHOST;
    }
    location.href="&lt;?php echo $url;?>";
}
//延时1S跳转，可自行修改延时时间
setTimeout(link_jump, 2250);
//延时50S关闭跳转页面，用于文件下载后不会关闭跳转页的问题
setTimeout(function(){window.opener=null;window.close();}, 50000);
&lt;/script>
&lt;title>&lt;?php echo $title;?>&lt;/title>

&lt;style type="text/css">
html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,table,caption,tbody,tfoot,thead,tr,th,td,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline}body{background:#3498db;}#loader-container{width:188px;height:188px;color:white;margin:0 auto;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);border:5px solid #3498db;border-radius:50%;-webkit-animation:borderScale 1s infinite ease-in-out;animation:borderScale 1s infinite ease-in-out;}#loadingText{font-family:'Raleway',sans-serif;font-size:1.4em;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);}@-webkit-keyframes borderScale{0%{border:5px solid white;}50%{border:25px solid #3498db;}100%{border:5px solid white;}}@keyframes borderScale{0%{border:5px solid white;}50%{border:25px solid #3498db;}100%{border:5px solid white;}}
&lt;/style>
&lt;body>
&lt;div id="loader-container">&lt;p id="loadingText">页面加载中...&lt;/p>&lt;/div>
&lt;/body>
&lt;/html></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>样式三、最最最好看的go跳转：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php 
/*
 * @Author        : Qinver
 * @Url           : zibll.com
 * @Date          : 2020-09-29 13:18:36
 * @LastEditTime  : 2020-10-08 17:42:52
 * @Email         : 770349780@qq.com
 * @Project       : Zibll子比主题
 * @Description   : 一款极其优雅的Wordpress主题
 * @Read me       : 感谢您使用子比主题，主题源码有详细的注释，支持二次开发。欢迎各位朋友与我相互交流。
 * @Remind        : 使用盗版主题会存在各种未知风险。支持正版，从我做起！
 */

if(strlen($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']) > 384 ||
    strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "eval(") ||
  strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "base64")) {
    @header("HTTP/1.1 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Status: 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Connection: Close");
    @exit;
}
//通过QUERY_STRING取得完整的传入数据，然后取得url=之后的所有值，兼容性更好
$t_url = preg_replace('/^url=(.*)$/i','$1',$_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);

//数据处理
if(!empty($t_url)) {
    //判断取值是否加密
    if ($t_url == base64_encode(base64_decode($t_url))) {
        $t_url =  base64_decode($t_url);
    }
    //对取值进行网址校验和判断
    preg_match('/^(http|https|thunder|qqdl|ed2k|Flashget|qbrowser):\/\//i',$t_url,$matches);
  if($matches){
      $url=$t_url;
      $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
  } else {
      preg_match('/\./i',$t_url,$matche);
      if($matche){
          $url='http://'.$t_url;
          $title='页面加载中,请稍候...';
      } else {
          $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
          $title='参数错误，正在返回首页...';
      }
  }
} else {
    $title = '参数缺失，正在返回首页...';
    $url = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
}
?>
&lt;html>
&lt;head>
&lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
&lt;meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
&lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0, minimum-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0">
&lt;noscript>&lt;meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1;url='&lt;?php echo $url;?>';">&lt;/noscript>
&lt;script>
function link_jump()
{
    //禁止其他网站使用我们的跳转页面
    var MyHOST = new RegExp("&lt;?php echo $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; ?>");
    if (!MyHOST.test(document.referrer)) {
         location.href="http://" + MyHOST;
    }
    location.href="&lt;?php echo $url;?>";
}
//延时1S跳转，可自行修改延时时间
setTimeout(link_jump, 2250);
//延时50S关闭跳转页面，用于文件下载后不会关闭跳转页的问题
setTimeout(function(){window.opener=null;window.close();}, 50000);
&lt;/script>
&lt;title>&lt;?php echo $title;?>&lt;/title>
&lt;style>html, body { width: 100%; height: 100%; margin: 0; background: #270F34; overflow: hidden; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center } css-doodle { --color: @p(#51eaea, #fffde1, #ff9d76, #FB3569); --rule: ( :doodle { @grid: 30x1 / 18vmin; --deg: @p(-180deg, 180deg); } :container { perspective: 30vmin; } :after, :before { content: ''; background: var(--color); @place-cell: @r(100%) @r(100%); @size: @r(6px); @shape: heart; } @place-cell: center; @size: 100%; box-shadow: @m(2, (0 0 50px var(--color))); background: @m(100, (radial-gradient(var(--color) 50%, transparent 0) @r(-20%, 120%) @r(-20%, 100%) / 1px 1px no-repeat)); will-change: transform, opacity; animation: scale-up 12s linear infinite; animation-delay: calc(-12s / @size() * @i()); @keyframes scale-up { 0%, 95.01%, 100% { transform: translateZ(0) rotate(0); opacity: 0; } 10% { opacity: 1; } 95% { transform: translateZ(35vmin) rotateZ(@var(--deg)); } } ) }&lt;/style>&lt;/head>
  &lt;body>
    &lt;css-doodle use="var(--rule)">&lt;/css-doodle>
    &lt;script src='https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/go-min.js'>&lt;/script>
  &lt;/body>
&lt;/html></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：上方js文件是调用我自己网站的，你自己下载或者打开复制到自己网站目录下使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:gallery {"linkTo":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-gallery has-nested-images columns-default is-cropped"><!-- wp:image {"id":270759} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/dbf3e7c0af212652.jpg" alt="图片[32]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270759"/><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">样式一</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1105,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313123752386-1600x746.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1105"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1106,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313123811662-1600x749.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1106"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></figure>
<!-- /wp:gallery -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_31">给网站挂个灯笼</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18376" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18376"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一、子比后台—自定义代码—自定义底部代码。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!-- 灯笼1 -->
&lt;div class="deng-box">
  &lt;div class="deng">
    &lt;div class="xian">&lt;/div>
    &lt;div class="deng-a">
      &lt;div class="deng-b">&lt;div class="deng-t">节&lt;/div>&lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;div class="shui shui-a">&lt;div class="shui-c">&lt;/div>&lt;div class="shui-b">&lt;/div>&lt;/div>
  &lt;/div>
&lt;/div>
 
&lt;!-- 灯笼2 -->
&lt;div class="deng-box1">
  &lt;div class="deng">
    &lt;div class="xian">&lt;/div>
    &lt;div class="deng-a">
      &lt;div class="deng-b">&lt;div class="deng-t">春&lt;/div>&lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;div class="shui shui-a">&lt;div class="shui-c">&lt;/div>&lt;div class="shui-b">&lt;/div>&lt;/div>
  &lt;/div>
&lt;/div></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>二、WP后台— 外观 —自定义—额外CSS。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>默认是灯笼都在右上角位置，比照原文主要是调整了位置，避免遮挡顶部导航菜单。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/**过年灯笼*/
.deng-box {
  position: fixed;
  top: 40px;
  right: -50px;
  z-index: 999;
}
 
.deng-box1 {
  position: fixed;
  top: 40px;
  z-index: 999;
  right: -20px;
}
 
.deng-box1 .deng {
  position: relative;
  width: 120px;
  height: 90px;
  margin: 50px;
  background: #d8000f;
  background: rgba(216, 0, 15, 0.8);
  border-radius: 50% 50%;
  -webkit-transform-origin: 50% -100px;
  -webkit-animation: swing 5s infinite ease-in-out;
  box-shadow: -5px 5px 30px 4px rgba(252, 144, 61, 1);
}
 
.deng {
  position: relative;
  width: 120px;
  height: 90px;
  margin: 50px;
  background: #d8000f;
  background: rgba(216, 0, 15, 0.8);
  border-radius: 50% 50%;
  -webkit-transform-origin: 50% -100px;
  -webkit-animation: swing 3s infinite ease-in-out;
  box-shadow: -5px 5px 50px 4px rgba(250, 108, 0, 1);
}
 
.deng-a {
  width: 100px;
  height: 90px;
  background: #d8000f;
  background: rgba(216, 0, 15, 0.1);
  margin: 12px 8px 8px 10px;
  border-radius: 50% 50%;
  border: 2px solid #dc8f03;
}
 
.deng-b {
  width: 45px;
  height: 90px;
  background: #d8000f;
  background: rgba(216, 0, 15, 0.1);
  margin: -4px 8px 8px 26px;
  border-radius: 50% 50%;
  border: 2px solid #dc8f03;
}
 
.xian {
  position: absolute;
  top: -20px;
  left: 60px;
  width: 2px;
  height: 20px;
  background: #dc8f03;
}
 
.shui-a {
  position: relative;
  width: 5px;
  height: 20px;
  margin: -5px 0 0 59px;
  -webkit-animation: swing 4s infinite ease-in-out;
  -webkit-transform-origin: 50% -45px;
  background: #ffa500;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
}
 
.shui-b {
  position: absolute;
  top: 14px;
  left: -2px;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  background: #dc8f03;
  border-radius: 50%;
}
 
.shui-c {
  position: absolute;
  top: 18px;
  left: -2px;
  width: 10px;
  height: 35px;
  background: #ffa500;
  border-radius: 0 0 0 5px;
}
 
.deng:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: -7px;
  left: 29px;
  height: 12px;
  width: 60px;
  content: " ";
  display: block;
  z-index: 999;
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
  border: solid 1px #dc8f03;
  background: #ffa500;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #dc8f03, #ffa500, #dc8f03, #ffa500, #dc8f03);
}
 
.deng:after {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -7px;
  left: 10px;
  height: 12px;
  width: 60px;
  content: " ";
  display: block;
  margin-left: 20px;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
  border: solid 1px #dc8f03;
  background: #ffa500;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, #dc8f03, #ffa500, #dc8f03, #ffa500, #dc8f03);
}
 
.deng-t {
  font-family: 华文行楷,Arial,Lucida Grande,Tahoma,sans-serif;
  font-size: 3.2rem;
  color: #dc8f03;
  font-weight: bold;
  line-height: 85px;
  text-align: center;
}
 
.night .deng-t, 
.night .deng-box, 
.night .deng-box1 {
  background: transparent !important;
}
 
@-moz-keyframes swing {
  0% {
    -moz-transform: rotate(-10deg)
  }
 
  50% {
    -moz-transform: rotate(10deg)
  }
 
  100% {
    -moz-transform: rotate(-10deg)
  }
}
 
@-webkit-keyframes swing {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-10deg)
  }
 
  50% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(10deg)
  }
 
  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(-10deg)
  }
}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){.deng-box{position: fixed; top: 23px; right: -50px; z-index: 999;}.deng-box1 { position: fixed; top: 23px; z-index: 999; right: -20px; }}&lt;br></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果是一边一个，上面代码开头的.deng-box和.deng-box1修改为下面代码即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">.deng-box {
  position: fixed;
  top: 40px;
  right: -20px;
  z-index: 999;
}
 
.deng-box1 {
  position: fixed;
  top: 40px;
  z-index: 999;
}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){.deng-box{position: fixed; top: 23px; right: 0; z-index: 999;}.deng-box1 { position: fixed; top: 23px; z-index: 999; right: auto; }}&lt;br></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>简单的修改，应该已适配电脑-手机</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270762} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/5a6d748774213328.jpg" alt="图片[35]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270762"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_32">侧边栏添加信息统计小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>WordPress信息统计小工具是前几天逛别的网站看到挺可以的，然后就到百度搜索一下，果然有很多这样的教程，但是那些小工具都只显示文字，不怎么美化，特别的简洁。作为喜欢花里胡哨和爱捣鼓的我，当然要进行一些修改啦！O(∩_∩)O哈哈~，然后我自己就弄出了看上去比较可以的信息统计小工具（算是图片版吧&lt;del&gt;~），代码基本都是借鉴大佬的（没那个能力写代码啊&lt;/del&gt;~苦逼的三无青年）。本来有9个信息统计（删除一些没用的，就剩下9个），但是我又新加了2个页面数据库查询和生成耗时，顿时就感觉这个信息统计小工具变长了，都是又不知道删除啥好，所以如果你觉得太长的话，自己删除或者注释掉一些没用的信息统计，再或者修改大小…好啦，话不多说，下面分享教程。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18555" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18555"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>有两种方式：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>（方式一）在主题目录下创建widget-websitestat.php文件，然后把下面的php代码添加进去。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php
// WordPress统计信息小工具
// 名称: 网站信息统计

// 定义小工具的类 EfanWebsitestat
class EfanWebsitestat extends WP_Widget{

  function __construct(){
    // 定义小工具的构造函数
    $widget_ops = array('classname' => 'widget_Websitestat', 'description' => '显示网站的统计信息');
    parent::__construct(false, 'WIIUII 网站统计', $widget_ops);
  }
  
  function form($instance){
    // 表单函数,控制后台显示
    // $instance 为之前保存过的数据
    // 如果之前没有数据的话,设置默认量
    $instance = wp_parse_args(
      (array)$instance,
      array(
        'title' => '网站信息统计',
        'establish_time' => '2021-01-01'
      )
    );
    
    $title = htmlspecialchars($instance['title']);
    $establish_time = htmlspecialchars($instance['establish_time']);
    
    // 表格布局输出表单
    $output = '&lt;table>';
    $output .= '&lt;tr>&lt;td>标题&lt;/td>&lt;td>';
    $output .= '&lt;input id="'.$this->get_field_id('title') .'" name="'.$this->get_field_name('title').'" type="text" value="'.$instance['title'].'" />';
    $output .= '&lt;/td>&lt;/tr>&lt;tr>&lt;td>建站时间：&lt;/td>&lt;td>';   
    $output .= '&lt;input id="'.$this->get_field_id('establish_time') .'" name="'.$this->get_field_name('establish_time').'" type="text" value="'.$instance['establish_time'].'" />';   
    $output .= '&lt;/td>&lt;/tr>&lt;/table>';  
    echo $output;   
  }
  
  function update($new_instance, $old_instance){
    // 更新数据的函数
    $instance = $old_instance;
    // 数据处理
    $instance['title'] = strip_tags(stripslashes($new_instance['title']));
    $instance['establish_time'] = strip_tags(stripslashes($new_instance['establish_time']));
    return $instance;
  }
  
  function widget($args, $instance){
    extract($args); //展开数组
    $title = apply_filters('widget_title',empty($instance['title']) ? ' ' : $instance['title']);
    $establish_time = empty($instance['establish_time']) ? '2021-01-01' : $instance['establish_time'];
    echo $before_widget;
    echo $before_title . $title . $after_title;
    echo '&lt;div class="widgest-boys">&lt;ul>';
    $this->efan_get_websitestat($establish_time);
    echo '&lt;/ul>&lt;/div>';
    echo $after_widget;
  }
  
  function efan_get_websitestat($establish_time){
    // 相关数据的获取
    global $wpdb;
    $count_posts = wp_count_posts();
    $published_posts = $count_posts->publish;
    $comments_count = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $wpdb->comments");
    $time = floor((time()-strtotime($establish_time))/86400);
    $count_tags = wp_count_terms('post_tag');
    $count_pages = wp_count_posts('page');
    $link = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $wpdb->links WHERE link_visible = 'Y'"); 
    $users = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM $wpdb->users");
    $last = $wpdb->get_results("SELECT MAX(post_modified) AS MAX_m FROM $wpdb->posts WHERE (post_type = 'post' OR post_type = 'page') AND (post_status = 'publish' OR post_status = 'private')");
    $last = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($last[0]->MAX_m));
    $total_views = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT SUM(meta_value+0) FROM $wpdb->postmeta WHERE meta_key = 'views'");  
    // 显示数据
    $output = '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg1">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>文章总数：';
    $output .= $published_posts;
    $output .= ' 篇&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg2">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>评论数目：';
    $output .= $comments_count;
    $output .= ' 条&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg3">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>标签总数：';
    $output .= $count_tags;
    $output .= ' 个&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg4">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>浏览次数：';
    $output .= $total_views;
    $output .= ' 次&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg5">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>友链总数：';
    $output .= $link;
    $output .= ' 个&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg6">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>用户总数：';
    $output .= $users;
    $output .= ' 个&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg7">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>运行天数：';
    $output .= $time;
    $output .= ' 天&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg8">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>建站时间：';
    $output .= $establish_time;
    $output .= '&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg9">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>最后更新：';
    $output .= $last;
    $output .= '&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    //   页面生成耗时+数据库查询  
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg10">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>数据查询：';
    $output .= get_num_queries();
    $output .= ' 次 &lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $output .= '&lt;div class="widgest-bg widgest-bg11">&lt;div class="widgest-main">&lt;div class="widgest-meat">&lt;li>生成耗时：';
    $output .= timer_stop(0,5);
    $output .= '秒&lt;/li>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    
    echo $output;
  }
}

function EfanWebsitestat(){
  // 注册小工具
  register_widget('EfanWebsitestat');
}

add_action('widgets_init','EfanWebsitestat');

?></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>（方式二）本站已经创建好文件，免去了你自己创建文件，在文章末尾处“资源下载”下载文件，然后上传到主题目录下即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、在主题目录下functions.php文件，添加下面的函数代码即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//添加站点统计小工具
include("widget-websitestat.php");</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、在网站后台—》主题设置—》自定义代码—》自定义CSS样式，添加下面的CSS代码，主题没有自定义CSS样式的，在主题目录下style.css添加即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*统计小模块*/
.widget_Websitestat h3{font-weight:700;}.widgest-boys{overflow:hidden;}.widgest-boys .widgest-bg{margin: 4px; background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 8px;}.widgest-boys .widgest-main{align-items: center; place-content: flex-start space-around; display: flex;}.widgest-boys .widgest-meat{display: block; margin-block-start: 1em; margin-block-end: 1em; margin-inline-start: 0px; margin-inline-end: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: 700 !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;}.widgest-bg:not(article){transition: all 0.3s;}.widgest-bg:not(article):hover{transform: translateX(-10px);}
/*图片路径设置*/
.widgest-bg1{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_1.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg2{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_2.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg3{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_3.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg4{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_4.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg5{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_5.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg6{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_6.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg7{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_7.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg8{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_8.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg9{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_9.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg10{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_10.jpeg);}
.widgest-bg11{background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/202265214415536a8ec8a13632762d0e984c674694de6f2533dc6e9_11.jpeg);}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明（非常重要）：图片我是通过一张图片剪切成11张图片（有11个信息统计），然后通过CSS添加进去的。你可以自己剪切11张图片，然后按顺序添加进去，css中”widgest-bg1-widgest-bg11″都是按顺序好的，在url(图片链接路径)里面加，不懂的找留言或者联系我。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>我用的剪切工具是在百度乱找的，呐！http://www.zuohaotu.com/cut-image.aspx就是这个。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>剪切教程：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1109,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313130249442-1600x613.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1109"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4、最后一步，在网站后台—》外观—》小工具—》WIIUII 网站统计，添加到侧边栏即可完成。<br>标题和建站时间自己填写。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1110,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313130333637.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1110"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270766} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/84597488a3213834.jpg" alt="图片[38]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270766"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_33">添加文章更新或过期失效提示</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_13175" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_13175"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>将下面的函数代码加入到主题目录下functions.php文件中。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//文章过期提示
function article_time_update() {
    date_default_timezone_set('PRC');
    $newdate=time();
    $updated_date = get_the_modified_time('Y-m-d H:i:s');
    $updatetime=strtotime($updated_date);
    $custom_content = '';
    if ( $newdate > $updatetime+86400) {
    $custom_content= '&lt;div class="article-timeout">&lt;strong>&lt;i class="fa fa-bell" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 温馨提示：&lt;/strong>本文最后更新于&lt;code>'. $updated_date . '&lt;/code>，某些文章具有时效性，若有错误或已失效，请在下方&lt;a href="#comment">留言&lt;/a>或联系&lt;a target="_blank" title="村少博客" href="https://www.cunshao.com">&lt;b>QQ86512&lt;/b>&lt;/a>。&lt;/div >';
    }
        echo $custom_content;
    }</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：请自己修改上面有关于本站的信息，改成自己网站信息即可，图标可以用阿里矢量图。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在主题目录zibll/inc/functions/zib-single.php文件中，文章分页函数（大概是178-182行，因为我的代码有改动，所有不确定行数，见下图）下面添加下方代码即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1111,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313130618165.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1111"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">article_time_update();//文章过期提示</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：（在自定义CSS样式添加下面代码）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*过期文章提示样式*/
.article-timeout{position:relative; border-radius: 8px; position: relative; margin-bottom: 25px; padding: 10px; background-color: var(--body-bg-color);}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270768} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/ad67433a69215012.jpg" alt="图片[40]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270768"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_34">评论框添加背景图片</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18152" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18152"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在主题设置—》自定义CSS样式，添加下面的CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*评论背景图*/
textarea#comment {background-color:transparent;background:linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/pinglu.png) right 10px bottom 10px no-repeat;-moz-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-webkit-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-o-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-ms-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;}
textarea#comment:focus {background-position-y:789px;-moz-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-webkit-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-o-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;-ms-transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;transition:ease-in-out 0.45s;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：图片自己保存到本地，图片大小（162 X 75，建议透明的png图片）,自己添加喜欢的背景图片。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270769} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/94a2bd1192215154.jpg" alt="图片[41]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270769"/></figure>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_35">更改文章列表样式</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_10437" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_10437"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章列表样式*/
@media screen and (min-width: 768px){.posts-item .item-thumbnail{width: 100%; height: 300px;}/*.posts-item .item-heading{text-align: center;}*/.posts-item .item-body{margin-top: 15px; width: calc(100% - 20px - 20px);}}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>上面该样式只有电脑、平板显示（即&gt;768px的显示），若需要手机或者全部显示，请用下面代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章列表样式*/
.posts-item .item-thumbnail{width: 100%; height: 300px;}/*.posts-item .item-heading{text-align: center;}*/.posts-item .item-body{margin-top: 15px; width: calc(100% - 20px - 20px);}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>本站正在使用的CSS样式：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章列表样式*/
@media screen and (min-width: 768px){.posts-item{padding: 10px;}/*.posts-item .item-heading{font-size: 22px;}*/.posts-item .item-thumbnail{width: 100%; height: 300px;}/*.posts-item .item-heading{text-align: center;}*/.posts-item .item-body{margin-top: 15px; width: 100%;margin-left: 0px;}}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270772} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/95997cfffa215352.jpg" alt="图片[42]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270772"/></figure>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_36">添加背景图片</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19164" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19164"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><p>CSS代码</p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*背景图*/
body {background: var(--body-bg-color);} :root{--body-bg-color:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/background(1).png) top fixed;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><p>说明：图片自己换，夜间无背景，全黑。</p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>新年背景图：<a href="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/newyear.jpg">https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/newyear.jpg</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270775} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/2ec7f3d30e215810.jpg" alt="图片[43]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270775"/></figure>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_37">添加B站追番页面</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>本来是准备把另一个追剧页面弄好后在一起发教程的，但一直还没有时间去弄追剧页面的样式美化（暂时没有了样式设计的想法），有星友需要这个页面，所以今天就先发布WordPressB站追番页面吧（后期会发布追剧的页面，敬请期待…）！O(∩_∩)O哈哈~。<br>WordPress追番页面是我在百度翻找了好久，无意间在GitHub找到的，是由Mario（蘑菇君）大佬二开的（大佬就大佬，我永远滴神…），然后我就是偷偷的拿来进行样式美化，虽然我只针对子比主题进行样式的美化，不过理论上应该所有WordPress主题皆可用，其他主题若不适用，自行修改CSS样式即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16240" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16240"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>零、说明</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>（其他WordPress主题需看）每个主题的页面模板的头和尾调用的方式和代码都不同，所以你需要自己在主题目录找到默认模板页面PHP文件（一般都叫“page.php”,然后创建新的PHP文件，复制默认页面代码进去，在合适的位置添加下面的核心代码即可[核心代码B站追番页面php文件我有注释]，同时还是得跟教程走滴），需要一点基础。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>B站追番页面需要在B站添加自己追番的剧，不然页面无法显示的哦！如何添加自己的追番自己百度一下。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>下面的教程主要以子比主题为例进行…</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>壹、上传文件和目录</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在文章末尾资源下载处下载文件，解压后把json目录上传到网站的根目录下，json目录中有两个文件是追剧页面的，我还没弄样式，后期我会发，如果介意请自行删除。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>把bilibili-bangumi.php文件上传到子比主题目录zibll/pages目录下。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>上传后文件中出现中文的乱码，可能ZIP对中文兼容性不是太好，请自行创建文件，然后复制代码进去即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>贰、修改文件</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、bilibiliAcconut.php文件</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>登陆B站，进入个人空间，获取UID（如下图）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1114,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313141316344.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1114"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>F12进入控制台（进入后需要刷新一遍）获取B站Cookie（如下图）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1115,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313141401552-1600x585.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1115"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在bilibiliAcconut.php文件中添加获取来的UID和Cookie（如下图）。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1116,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://v1-1259035827.cos.accelerate.myqcloud.com/2023/03/20230313141542157.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1116"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>叁、创建页面</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在网站后台—&gt;页面—&gt;新建页面—&gt;页面属性–模板–B站追番页面（古腾堡编辑器是这样的，不知道经典编辑器是不是一样），然后发布页面即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>资源下载地址：<a href="https://pan.cunshao.com/pan/202207/04/bilibili-master.zip">https://pan.cunshao.com/pan/202207/04/bilibili-master.zip</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>项目地址：https://github.com/Fog-Forest/bilibili</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270781} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/c3986aa20b220131.jpg" alt="图片[47]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270781"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_38">底部炫酷引导卡片小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15925" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15925"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在后台—》外观—》小工具—》首页-底部全宽度，自定义HTML添加下面代码即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;div id="wiiuii" style="box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--main-shadow);">
&lt;section class="buy-container">
  &lt;div class="buy-box">
    &lt;div class="slogan">
      &lt;h3>荔枝博客&lt;/h3>
      &lt;p>欢迎光临寒舍！&lt;/p>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;ul class="actions">
      &lt;li>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_39">添加短视频聚合无水印解析页面</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>短视频聚合无水印解析页面是我很久之前就弄了，但弄好之后就不怎么管了，采用了非常简洁的样式，非常的简单。说是聚合无水印解析，其实我也没怎么测试过（只测试了抖音、快手、最右这几个短视频软件），解析的API采用大佬的接口。好啦！废话少说，下面安排教程！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18514" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18514"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>（其他的WP主题要注意看哦！）页面的头尾代码我只采用符合本站主题（子比主题）的头部和尾部代码，WP其他主题使用可能会出现样式错乱。若其他WP主题使用请自行添加和复制自己主题目录下的默认页面模板（一般都是默认模板的文件都是page.php文件），然后在合适的位置添加下方教程的核心代码即可啦！需要有点基础哦！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第一步：页面代码</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>使用子比主题的朋友请看过来！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>使用子比的朋友，直接在子比主题目录/zibll/pages/下创建一个PHP文件，然后复制下面的代码添加进去即可完成第一步！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php

/**
 * Template name: 聚合解析页面
 * Description:   aggregation_analysis
 */

// 获取链接列表
get_header();
$header_style = zib_get_page_header_style();
?>
&lt;main class="container">
    &lt;div class="content-wrap">
        &lt;div class="content-layout">
            &lt;?php while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
                &lt;?php if ($header_style != 1) {
                    echo zib_get_page_header();
                } ?>
                &lt;div class="box-body theme-box radius8 main-bg main-shadow">
                    &lt;?php if ($header_style == 1) {
                        echo zib_get_page_header();
                    } ?>
                    &lt;!---->
                    &lt;html>
                        &lt;head>
                        &lt;meta charset="utf-8">
                        &lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
                        &lt;style>
                        .inputUrl{width: 100%; display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; align-items: center; flex-direction: column;} .textUrl{width: 90%; height: 45px; outline: none; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 8px; border: 1.5px solid #c0c0c0; outline: none; background: #00000000; font-weight: 700; box-shadow: 0px 0px 2px #eeeeee;} .sendBtn{width: 90%; height: 40px; margin: 15px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 2px #555; font-weight: 700;} .sendBtn:hover{background-color: #FFF;} .down{text-align: center;} .down a{display: inline-block; padding: 0 1em; margin: 0.5em; height: 2.75em; border: solid 1px #c8cccf; border-radius: 4px; background-color: transparent; color: #414f57!important; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 2.75em; font-weight: 700;} #myDiv{color: #0089fff0; overflow-y: hidden; background-color: #f0f1f1fa; margin: 10px; border-radius: 8px; word-wrap: break-word;} #myDiv1{text-align: center;font-weight: 700;padding: 10px;}
                        &lt;/style>
                        &lt;/head>
                        &lt;!--&lt;div id="wrapper">-->
                            &lt;!--&lt;form method="post">-->
                              &lt;div id="myDiv1">
                                &lt;p>
                                  目前支持:抖音/皮皮虾/火山/微视/微博/绿洲/最右/轻视频/instagram/哔哩哔哩/快手/全民小视频/皮皮搞笑
                                  &lt;br>
                                  温馨提示:粘贴视频地址时无需删除文案 但如果视频链接正确但解析失败请删掉文案后重试
                                &lt;/p>
                              &lt;/div>
                              &lt;div class="inputUrl">
                              &lt;input class="textUrl" type="text" placeholder="请粘贴视频链接" id="input1" class="longurl">
                              &lt;input class="btn sendBtn" type="button" onclick="setValue()" value="解析">
                              &lt;/div>
                            &lt;/form>
                            &lt;div class="down">&lt;/div>
                              &lt;div id="myDiv">&lt;/div>
                        &lt;/div>
                        &lt;script>
                        function  setValue(){
                        var v =  document.getElementById("input1").value;
                            var xmlhttp;
                            if(window.XMLHttpRequest){
                              xmlhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();
                              }
                            else{
                            xmlhttp=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");}
                            xmlhttp.open("GET","https://tenapi.cn/video?url="+v,false);
                            xmlhttp.send();
                            document.getElementById("myDiv").innerHTML=xmlhttp.responseText;
                        　  var jsonObj = JSON.parse(xmlhttp.responseText); 
                            $(".down").html('&lt;h4 id="form-title" style="font-weight: 700;">'+jsonObj.title+'&lt;/h4>&lt;a id="form-cover" href="'+jsonObj.cover+'" target="_blank" download="video">下载封面&lt;/a>&lt;a id="form-video" href="'+jsonObj.url+'" target="_blank" download="video">下载视频&lt;/a>&lt;a id="form-music" href="'+jsonObj.music+'" target="_blank" download="video">下载音乐&lt;/a>');
                        }
                        &lt;/script>
                    &lt;/html>
                &lt;!---->
                &lt;?php endwhile;  ?>
                &lt;/div>
                &lt;?php comments_template('/template/comments.php', true); ?>
        &lt;/div>
    &lt;/div>
    &lt;?php get_sidebar(); ?>
&lt;/main>
&lt;?php
get_footer();</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：代码中相关的文字，可以自行修改。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第二步：新建页面</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在WP网站后台—》页面—》新建页面—-》页面属性—》模板—》选择“WIIUII-聚合解析页面”，填写标题、固定连接（非必须），最后发布即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270788} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/a7c41ec5ad224506.jpg" alt="图片[49]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270788"/></figure>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_40">公告弹窗样式美化</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14421" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14421"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>其实就是一个简单的HTML代码（因为弹窗公告支持HTML代码），自己在弹窗内容里面添加代码即可。图片、信息啥的自己修改即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;html>
    &lt;body>
&lt;!--文本-->
&lt;a href="https://www.cunshao.com/" target="_blank"  title="村少博客">
    &lt;img style="display: inline-block; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; height: auto;border-radius: 10px;-webkit-border-radius: 10px;-moz-border-radius: 10px;" src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/img/ttvvg.gif">
&lt;/a>
        &lt;div class="text_body" style="padding-bottom: 30px;">
            &lt;div class="text" id="container" style="font-weight:bold;">
                欢迎光临寒舍！还在使用本站《子比主题添加底部统计信息模块小工具》文章中修改版的小伙伴，出现“用户总数”不显示的，请更新一下PHP代码，我已经更新PHP代码在文章中了。另外所有教程的图片链接，请自行下载上传到本地或者上传其他图床，谢谢啦。
            &lt;/div>
        &lt;/div>
&lt;!--文本结束-->
&lt;script type="text/javascript">
var text = $("#container").text().trim();
        $("#container").html("");
        for(var i = 0;i &lt; text.length;i++){
            $("#container").append("&lt;span>"+text[i]+"&lt;/span>")
        }
        var s = 0;
        var tim = setInterval(function(){
            $("#container span").eq(s++).css("color",getColor()).show();
            if(s == text.length){
                clearInterval(tim)
            }
        }, 100)
        function getColor(){
            return "rgb("+Math.floor(Math.random()*255)+","+Math.floor(Math.random()*255)+","+Math.floor(Math.random()*255)+")";
        }
        &lt;/script>
    &lt;/body>
&lt;/html></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270789} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/0ee591986e225045.jpg" alt="图片[50]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270789"/></figure>

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_41">修改主题字体（网站字体美化）</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11599" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11599"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：（字体样式一：）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group=""> /*字体*/
@font-face{font-family:"wiiuii";src:url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/adjzRQKK4rMhqM7T.ttf);}
*{font-family:"wiiuii"}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码（字体样式二）：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*全站字体美化*/
@font-face{
font-family: 'moe';
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.ttf');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.otf');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.dfont');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.eot');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.svg');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.woff');
src:  url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/muwenhuan/Coolimg/fzlty.woff2');
}
body{
font-family:'moe';
}
.enlighter-default .enlighter{max-height:400px;overflow-y:auto !important;}.lazyloading:not(.swiper-lazy-loaded){opacity: 0;}@media (max-width:640px) {
    .meta-right .meta-view{
      display: unset !important;
    }
  }</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注：（非常重要）font-family是自定义字体名称（自己修改），url这是字体文件的地址（自己修改），*这是全局显示。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_42">好看的侧边ip标签小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11909" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11909"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">代码：</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;div id="wiiuii1">
  &lt;img src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/ipqianmingdang" class="post-cover-img-more ls-is-cached lazyloaded" data-src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/ipqianmingdang" alt="no pic now" style="/*border-radius:5px;*/border-radius: var(--main-radius);box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--main-shadow);">&lt;script>document.getElementById("wiiuii1").parentNode.parentNode.style.padding=0;&lt;/script>&lt;/div></code></pre>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_43">侧边在线征稿小工具</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_12701" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_12701"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;style type="text/css">

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_44">下载页面添加声明或说明</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15008" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15008"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>HTML代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--开始-->
                &lt;style>
                .but-download>.but,.but-download>span{min-width: 200px;padding: .5em;margin-top: 10px;}.pay-extra-hide{background: var(--muted-border-color);display: block;margin: 10px;padding: 20px;color: var(--muted-color);border-radius: 4px;}
                .panel:hover{border: 1px solid #FF6666;}/*框颜色背景色*/
                .panel{margin-bottom: 10px; background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #268df7; border-radius: 4px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05); box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);}
                .panel-heading{padding: 10px 15px;border-bottom: 1px solid #268df7;border-top-left-radius: 3px;border-top-right-radius: 3px;color: #0000FF;background-color: #99CCFF;}/*边框部分颜色*/
                .panel-heading h3{margin-top: 0;margin-bottom: 0;font-size: 14px;color: #0000FF;font-family: inherit;font-weight: 500;line-height: 1.1;}
                .panel-body .help li{line-height:25px;font-size:14px;color: #000;}
                .panel-body .help li em{font-style:normal;background: #FFFFCC;padding:5px;border-radius:4px;color: #FF3399;}
                .panel-body .shengming{line-height:25px;font-size:14px;color:#C33;}
                &lt;/style>
                &lt;div class="panel">
                     &lt;div class="panel-heading">
                          &lt;h3>下载说明&lt;/h3>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel-body">
                      &lt;ul class="help">
                        &lt;li>1.村少博客所提供的压缩包若无特别说明，解压密码均为&lt;em>www.cunshao.com&lt;/em>;&lt;/li>
                        &lt;li>2.下载后文件若为压缩包格式，请安装7Z软件或者其它压缩软件进行解压;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>3.文件比较大的时候，建议使用下载工具进行下载，浏览器下载有时候会自动中断，导致下载错误;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>4.资源可能会由于内容问题被和谐，导致下载链接不可用，遇到此问题，请到文章页面进行反馈，以便村少博客及时进行更新;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>5.其他下载问题请自行搜索教程，这里不一一讲解。&lt;/li>
                      &lt;/ul>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel">
                     &lt;div class="panel-heading">
                       &lt;h3>站长声明&lt;/h3>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel-body">
                      &lt;span class="shengming">本站大部分下载资源收集于网络，只做学习和交流使用，版权归原作者所有，若为付费资源，请在下载后24小时之内自觉删除，若作商业用途，请到原网站购买，由于未及时购买和付费发生的侵权行为，与本站无关。本站发布的内容若侵犯到您的权益，请联系本站删除，我们将及时处理！&lt;/span>
                     &lt;/div>
                    &lt;/div>
                &lt;!--结束--></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>添加说明（注意）：主题目录zibll/pages/download.php,在合适的位置添加上面的即可，大概是在115行位置添加（我的在115行添加，不知道新版有没有变化）。</p>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_45">左侧菜单添加背景图片（手机才能看）</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17876" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17876"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*手机侧边栏背景图片*/
@media (max-width: 767px){
.mobile-navbar.show,.mobile-navbar.left{
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center center;
    cursor: pointer;
  background-image:linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255,255,0),rgba(255,255,255, 0.3)),url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/20200829145305_5a9ac.jpg);}
  .mobile-nav-widget .box-body {
    background: var(--muted-border-color) !important;}
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注意:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>这是一个简单的CSS代码，若要更换图片请把‘‘url(https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/20200829145305_5a9ac.jpg)’’更换成“url(自己的图片链接)”即可。</p>
