<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_46">子比主题下载页面美化（简单的美化）</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>这是简单的改动一下代码，添加了几个类，如果作者更新主题时下载页面没改动代码的话，更新主题后【复制粘贴代码】进去就能用！（更新前记得备份！记得备份！记得备份！不然就被刷新代码了）</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19849" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19849"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码:（一些说明请仔细看）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：（放在哪，这里就不在说了，自己可以压缩一下CSS代码）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*下载样式*/
.download-article{
    padding: 0 10px;
}
.download-demo{
   margin: 10px 0;
  border: 1px dashed red;
    border-radius: 5px;
}
.download-wiui{
  padding: 5px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.download-sty{
      text-align: center;
    height: 100%;
}
.download-sty p{
    font-size: 15px !important;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0;
}
.download-sty img{
width: 140px;
    height: 100%;
}
.download-theme-box{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    display: inline-flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: center;
}
.download-right{
margin-left: 20px;
}

.download-file-name{
    font-size: 20px;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PHP代码：（这是整个文件的代码，粘贴时记得把那个PHP文件里面的代码【清空！清空！清空！】）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php

/**
 * Template name: Zibll-资源下载
 * Description:   download page
 */

if (empty($_GET['post'])) {
  get_header();
  get_template_part('template/content-404');
  get_footer();
  exit;
}
get_header();
$post_id = $_GET['post'];

function zibpay_get_down_html($post_id)
{

  $pay_mate = get_post_meta($post_id, 'posts_zibpay', true);
  $html = '';
  if (empty($pay_mate['pay_type']) || empty($pay_mate['pay_type']) || $pay_mate['pay_type'] != '2') {
    return get_template_part('template/content-404');
  };

  // 查询是否已经购买
  $paid_obj = zibpay_is_paid($post_id);
  $posts_title = get_the_title($post_id) . get_post_meta($post_id, 'subtitle', true);
  $pay_title = !empty($pay_mate['pay_title']) ? $pay_mate['pay_title'] : $posts_title;
  $pay_doc = $pay_mate['pay_doc'];
  $pay_details = $pay_mate['pay_details'];
  if ($paid_obj) {
    //已经购买直接显示下载盒子

    $paid_name = zibpay_get_paid_type_name($paid_obj['paid_type']);
    $paid_name = '&lt;b class="badg jb-red mr6" style="margin-left: 5px; font-size: 12px; padding: 2px 10px; line-height: 1.4; ">&lt;i class="fa fa-check mr6" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i>' . $paid_name . '&lt;/b>';

    $pay_extra_hide = !empty($pay_mate['pay_extra_hide']) ? '&lt;div class="pay-extra-hide">' . $pay_mate['pay_extra_hide'] . '&lt;/div>' : '';

    $dowmbox = '&lt;div style="/*margin-bottom:3em;*/">' . zibpay_get_post_down_buts($pay_mate, $paid_obj['paid_type'], $post_id) . '&lt;/div>';
    if ($paid_obj['paid_type'] == 'free' &amp;&amp; _pz('pay_free_logged_show') &amp;&amp; !is_user_logged_in()) {
      $dowmbox = '&lt;div class="alert jb-yellow em12" style="margin: 2em 0;">&lt;b>免费资源，请登录后下载&lt;/b>&lt;/div>';
      $pay_extra_hide = '&lt;div class="text-center pay-extra-hide">';
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;p class="box-body muted-2-color">请先登录！&lt;/p>';
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;p>';
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;a href="javascript:;" class="signin-loader but jb-blue padding-lg">&lt;i class="fa fa-fw fa-sign-in mr10" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i>登录&lt;/a>';
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;a href="javascript:;" class="signup-loader ml10 but jb-yellow padding-lg">&lt;i data-class="icon mr10" data-viewbox="0 0 1024 1024" data-svg="signup" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i>注册&lt;/a>';
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;/p>';
      $pay_extra_hide .= zib_social_login(false);
      $pay_extra_hide .= '&lt;/div>';
    }
    
    $html = '&lt;div class="download-demo">&lt;div class="panel-heading">&lt;h3>&lt;i class="fa fa-paper-plane-o" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 文件下载&lt;/h3>&lt;/div>';
        $html .= '&lt;div class="download-wiui">';
        /*微信公众号图片在下面的&lt;img>里面，自己放自己的图片链接 文字自己修改*/
        $html .= '&lt;div class="download-sty">&lt;img src="https://www.cunshao.com/666666/meihua/%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E5%85%AC%E4%BC%97%E5%8F%B71.png" />&lt;p>关注村少博客公众号不迷路&lt;/p>&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;div class="download-right">&lt;div class="article-header download-theme-box">&lt;div class="article-title" style="margin-top: 0;">&lt;span class="download-file-name">[文件名] &lt;/span>&lt;a href="' . get_permalink($post_id) . '#posts-pay">' . $pay_title . '&lt;/a>&lt;/div>' . $paid_name . '&lt;/div>';

    $html .= '&lt;div>' . $pay_doc . '&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;div class="muted-2-color em09">' . $pay_details . '&lt;/div>';

    $html .= '&lt;div>' . $dowmbox . $pay_extra_hide . '&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';
    
  } else {
    //未购买
    $html = '&lt;div class="article-header theme-box">&lt;div class="article-title">&lt;a href="' . get_permalink($post_id) . '#posts-pay">' . $pay_title . '&lt;/a>&lt;/div>&lt;/div>';

    $html .= '&lt;div>' . $pay_doc . '&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;div class="muted-2-color em09" style="margin: 2em 0;">' . $pay_details . '&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;div class="alert jb-red em12" style="margin: 2em 0;">&lt;b>暂无下载权限&lt;/b>&lt;/div>';
    $html .= '&lt;a style="margin-bottom: 2em;" href="' . get_permalink($post_id) . '#posts-pay" class="but jb-yellow padding-lg">&lt;i class="fa fa-long-arrow-left" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i>&lt;span class="ml10">返回文章&lt;/span>&lt;/a>';
  }

  return $html;
}

?>
&lt;style>
.but-download>.but,.but-download>span{min-width: 200px;padding: .5em;margin-top: 10px;}.pay-extra-hide{background: var(--muted-border-color);display: block;margin: 10px;padding: 20px;color: var(--muted-color);border-radius: 4px;}
&lt;/style>
&lt;main class="container">
  &lt;div class="content-wrap">
    &lt;div class="content-layout">


      &lt;?php while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
        &lt;?php echo zib_get_page_header(); ?>

        &lt;div class="zib-widget article download-article" style="/*min-height: 600px;*/">

          &lt;?php
          echo zibpay_get_down_html($post_id);
          $page_links_content_s = get_post_meta(get_queried_object_id(), 'page_show_content', true);
          if ($page_links_content_s) {
            the_content();
            wp_link_pages(
              array(
                'before'           => '&lt;p class="text-center post-nav-links radius8 padding-6">',
                'after'            => '&lt;/p>',
              )
            );
            echo '&lt;/div>';
          }
          ?>
          &lt;!--开始-->
                &lt;style>
                .but-download>.but,.but-download>span{min-width: 200px;padding: .5em;margin-top: 10px;}.pay-extra-hide{background: var(--muted-border-color);display: block;margin: 10px;padding: 20px;color: var(--muted-color);border-radius: 4px;}
                .panel:hover,.download-demo:hover{border: 1px dashed #FF6666;}/*框颜色背景色*/
                .panel:hover h3,.download-demo:hover h3{color:#fff;}
                .panel{margin-bottom: 10px; background-color: #fff; border: 1px dashed #268df7; border-radius: 4px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05); box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.05);}
                .panel-heading{padding: 10px 15px;border-bottom: 1px solid #268df7;border-top-left-radius: 3px;border-top-right-radius: 3px;color: #0000FF;background-color: #99CCFF;}/*边框部分颜色*/
                .panel-heading h3{margin-top: 0;margin-bottom: 0;font-size: 14px;color: #0000FF;font-family: inherit;font-weight: 500;line-height: 1.1;}
                .panel-body .help li{line-height:25px;font-size:14px;color: #000;}
                .panel-body .help li em{font-style:normal;background: #FFFFCC;padding:5px;border-radius:4px;color: #FF3399;}
                .panel-body .shengming{line-height:25px;font-size:14px;color:#C33;}
                &lt;/style>
                &lt;div class="panel">
                     &lt;div class="panel-heading">
                          &lt;h3>&lt;i class="fa fa-paper-plane-o" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 下载说明&lt;/h3>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel-body">
                      &lt;ul class="help">
                        &lt;li>1.村少博客所提供的压缩包若无特别说明，解压密码均为&lt;em>www.cunshao.com&lt;/em>;&lt;/li>
                        &lt;li>2.下载后文件若为压缩包格式，请安装7Z软件或者其它压缩软件进行解压;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>3.文件比较大的时候，建议使用下载工具进行下载，浏览器下载有时候会自动中断，导致下载错误;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>4.资源可能会由于内容问题被和谐，导致下载链接不可用，遇到此问题，请到文章页面进行反馈，以便村少博客及时进行更新;&lt;/li>
                      &lt;li>5.其他下载问题请自行搜索教程，这里不一一讲解。&lt;/li>
                      &lt;/ul>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel">
                     &lt;div class="panel-heading">
                       &lt;h3>&lt;i class="fa fa-paper-plane-o" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 站长声明&lt;/h3>
                     &lt;/div>
                     &lt;div class="panel-body">
                      &lt;span class="shengming">本站大部分下载资源收集于网络，只做学习和交流使用，版权归原作者所有，若为付费资源，请在下载后24小时之内自觉删除，若作商业用途，请到原网站购买，由于未及时购买和付费发生的侵权行为，与本站无关。本站发布的内容若侵犯到您的权益，请联系本站删除，我们将及时处理！&lt;/span>
                     &lt;/div>
                    &lt;/div>
                &lt;!--结束-->
          &lt;?php ?>
        &lt;?php endwhile; ?>
        &lt;/div>
        &lt;?php comments_template('/template/comments.php', true); ?>
    &lt;/div>
  &lt;/div>
  &lt;?php get_sidebar(); ?>
&lt;/main>

&lt;?php

get_footer();</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注意:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PHP文件路径：主题文件夹/zibll/pages/download.php</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>有一些文字说明比如：站长声明、下载说明，自己在代码中修改一下。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>微信公众号的图片+文字，代码里面有注释提示的，自己改一下就好。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270801} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/39a8f656d2231038.jpg" alt="图片[55]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270801"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_47">子比主题首页轮播图按钮样式美化</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>这个应该好好吐槽一下，主题作者应该更新美化轮播图按钮样式，太矩形了（边角弄圆一点也好呀!）,自己动手丰衣足食，喜欢我这个样式的小伙伴，拿去吧！点赞一波就好啦！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19745" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19745"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CSS代码：（压缩过了）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*幻灯片上一张、下一张按钮样式*/
.swiper-button-next, .swiper-button-prev{height: 70px !important;}.swiper-button-prev{border-top-right-radius: 8px;border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;}.swiper-button-next{border-top-left-radius: 8px;border-bottom-left-radius: 8px;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270802} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/b90b7d6e8b231417.jpg" alt="图片[56]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270802"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_48">子比主题【夜/日】间模式切换小提示</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>用jQuery+Layer.js实现的一个主题切换小提示，懒得弄花里胡哨的了，随便水一篇文章，不收录到子比主题教程里面了。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15011" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15011"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第一步：调用Layer.js</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Layer.js是一个非常优秀的弹层组件，看自己是否已经调用了Layer组件（办法：先别调用下面的Layer.js,看直接使用第二步的代码能否使用，若无法使用就证明没有调用Layer，自己把下面的代码放到主题里【自定义头部HTML代码】）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/layui/2.6.8/layui.min.js">&lt;/script></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第二步：jQuery代码</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>把下面的jQuery代码放到主题设置的【自定义javascript代码】就大功告成啦！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">// 夜间切换
$(".toggle-theme").click(function() {
var toggleThemeText = "当前为日间模式";
if (!$("body").hasClass('dark-theme')) {
toggleThemeText = "当前为夜间模式";
}
layer.msg(toggleThemeText, {
time: 2000,
anim: 1
});
});</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":270803} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://www.cunshao.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/acb7358c65231649.jpg" alt="图片[57]-子比美化教程合集 美化只看这一篇文章就够了！！！-zibll美化交流分享社区-zibll子比主题-Wordpress主题模板-zibll子比主题" class="wp-image-270803"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="wznav_49">子比主题设置网站的背景为图片背景</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_15664" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong>美化教程</strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_15664"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>提示：建议夜间模式下不使用背景图片</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/***日间主题模式***/
body {
    background-image: url("/**这里改为你自己的图片地址**/");
    background-position-x: center;
    background-position-y: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-attachment: fixed;
    background-size: cover;
}
/***夜间主题模式***/
.dark-theme {
    background-position-x: center;
    background-position-y: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-attachment: fixed;
    background-image: url("/**这里改为你自己的图片地址**/");
    background-size: cover;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[傻妞机器人搭建（含配套功能脚本）]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1152.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 20 Mar 2023 15:11:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1152</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">0.机器人功能</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1153,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"attachment"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image.png"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1153"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>0.0.机器人脚本，脚本下载地址在文章最后<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1154,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-1.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1154"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-alpha-channel-opacity"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>搭建教程如下：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.安装必要依赖</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">yum install wget unzip gcc gcc-c++ git screen -y</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2.安装傻妞</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">s=sillyGirl;a=arm64;if [[ $(uname -a | grep "x86_64") != "" ]];then a=amd64;fi ;if [ ! -d $s ];then mkdir $s;fi ;cd $s;wget https://ghproxy.com/https://github.com/cdle/${s}/releases/download/main/${s}_linux_$a -O $s &amp;&amp; chmod 777 $s;pkill -9 $s;$(pwd)/$s</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3.安装node环境</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">cd /usr/local  &amp;&amp; wget https://nodejs.org/dist/v14.17.5/node-v14.17.5-linux-x64.tar.xz</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4.解压下载的文件</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">xz -dk node-v14.17.5-linux-x64.tar.xz  &amp;&amp; tar -xvf node-v14.17.5-linux-x64.tar</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>5.修改环境变量，修改 /etc/profile 文件，末尾添加</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">export NODE_HOME=/usr/local/node-v14.17.5-linux-x64
export PATH=$PATH:$NODE_HOME/bin
export NODE_PATH=$NODE_HOME/lib/node_modules</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>6.让配置生效</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">source /etc/profile</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>7.下载onebot</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">cd ~ &amp;&amp; git clone https://ghproxy.com/https://github.com/takayama-lily/node-onebot.git</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>8.手动去文件夹/root/node-onebot 找到config.sample.js<br>把config.sample.js重命名为config.js，然后修改如下内容，对着搞<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1155,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-2.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1155"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>9.启动傻妞</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">cd &amp;&amp; cd sillyGirl &amp;&amp; ./sillyGirl -t</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>10.启动的时候会打印出来，用户名和密码，访问服务器的&nbsp;<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="http://ip:8080/" target="_blank">http://ip:8080</a>&nbsp;如果不能访问确认是否放行8080端口<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1156,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-3.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1156"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>11.登录界面之后将下载的脚本全部上传，一个一个新增<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1157,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-4.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1157"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>12.配置机器人监听群，配置你自己需要的群<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1158,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-5.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1158"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>13.将傻妞以静默运行，防止掉线</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">./sillyGirl -d</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>14.登录机器人，第一次登录，需要输入密码</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">cd &amp;&amp; cd node-onebot &amp;&amp; node main 机器人QQ</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>15.第一次登录可能需要输入ticket，获取步骤如下<br>①将该链接复制到浏览器打开，电脑端<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1159,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-6.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1159"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>②打开浏览器之后，按 F12 打开控制台，进入指定位置之后在滑动验证，复制ticket之后输入即可<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>16.登录成功之后，即可正常群里使用命令唤起机器人<br>17.配置机器人后台运行，防止掉线，安装需要一会</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1160,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-7.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1160"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">npm install -g pm2</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>18.执行进程守护，执行后可以看到online</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">cd &amp;&amp; cd node-onebot &amp;&amp; pm2 start "node main 机器人QQ"</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1161,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/image-8.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1161"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>19.脚本下载地址如下：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[多媒体云切片网盘]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1174.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 24 Mar 2023 15:15:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1174</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3> 多媒体云切片网盘，支持多服务器切片价值1k</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>高质量、高稳固性的CDN服，视频切片系统主要功能是把视频转码为m3u8格式<br>互站上安装+源码卖1k，这里分享给诸位，我本地安装了一次保证程序的可用性，同时也附带了安装教程，在压缩包中，请自行参考安装。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>功能详情：</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>可以对接同步插件，同步到苹果8x。数据（题：+图片地址+播放地址）<br>转码后Linux字幕，汉字不会出现方块问题。<br>转码设置能设置，logo水印四个可用。可用多服务器<br>前台自带转码，无需重复安装转码端。接受定制二开。<br>市面上流传的源码大多数右后门，这套源码我拿到手的时候没发现！搭建起来一天就被删了文件后面排查出来清除掉了后门！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","id":1175,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image aligncenter size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1679670547-6033400e51cff.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1175"/><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">演示图</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[smarty_hankin主题，一款免费开源wordpress主题]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1237.html</link>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>安装smarty_hankin主题<br>您可以通过两种不同的方式安装WordPress主题：<br>1. 通过网站后台上传<br>进入WordPress网站后台，点击外观-主题-上传主题<br>安装完成后，您需要启用主题，进入后台-外观-主题，找到smarty_hankin主题并启用</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1238,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1679845288-image.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1238"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>pjax无刷新体验<br>12种配色，5种布局，支持暗黑模式，毛玻璃效果<br>侧边栏小工具，音乐播放器，内置Mac界面代码高亮行号显示，<br>强大的后台设置<br>丰富的自定义页面<br>还有更多…</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>高级设置<br>Markdown语法可参照：http://www.markdown.cn/#overview<br>相当不错的在线Markdown编辑：http://markdown.xiaoshujiang.com/</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>外观设置</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如上打开之后展示效果如下：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>文章设置<br>支付宝和微信的二维码位置相反，等作者修复</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>音乐设置<br>开启播放器：开/关<br>开启自动播放：开/关<br>循环：列表循环/单曲循环<br>播放列表id：URL形如 https://music.163.com/#/my/m/music/playlist?id==9474056ID即为id=后面的数字</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>幻灯片<br>显示在右侧小工具作者头像上方<br>显示效果查看本网站即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>友情链接<br>显示在左下角友链位置展开</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>SEO<br>对于需求收录之类的人有一定帮助</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>自定义代码<br>DIY我的网站，我的网站我做主</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>备份<br>记得要备份哦，妈妈再也不会担心主题数据丢失了</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>外观小工具<br>按照需求自行添加右侧显示效果</p>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[PHP实现获取本地视频进行随机播放]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1248.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 02 Apr 2023 15:50:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1248</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>创建一个文件夹，里面随便方视频文件即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>列如文件夹名字是assets代码如下</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?


$handler = opendir('./assets/mp4/');//当前目录中的文件夹下的文件夹     需要获取的目录文件夹名字
while( ($filename = readdir($handler)) !== false ) {
      if($filename != "." &amp;&amp; $filename != ".."){
          //echo $filename."&lt;br>";
          $tmp[] =  $filename;
      }
}
closedir($handler);
//print_r($tmp);

$arr=array_rand($tmp);
$video='./assets/mp4/'.$tmp[$arr];
header("location:$video");





?></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator has-alpha-channel-opacity"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码解释</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?


$handler = opendir('./assets/mp4/');//./assets(文件夹)/mp4（文件夹）

while( ($filename = readdir($handler)) !== false ) {
      if($filename != "." &amp;&amp; $filename != ".."){
          //echo $filename."&lt;br>";
          $tmp[] =  $filename;
      }
}
closedir($handler);
//print_r($tmp);

$arr=array_rand($tmp);
$video='./assets/mp4/'.$tmp[$arr];//./assets(文件夹)/mp4（存放视频的文件夹）
header("location:$video");





?></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;如果你创建一个文件夹命名为：美女，这个文件夹里面有很多视频</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>我们可以在这个文件夹外面创建一个php文件</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>代码中需要修改的地方如下</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/1680450646-10ae4872f07f35b17aade3897fd175ed.png" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/1680450648-5f3506403b4b9aef141e55cbf47bad02.png" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>修改为./美女/</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>这样即可访问</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/1680450649-639694d2a6a67e4b5202374b5cf9301c.png" alt=""/></figure>

<p>上面为随机视频PHP代码，下面是个性小电视源码介绍如下</p>

    &lt;!--为网页定义描述内容 用于告诉搜索引擎，你网站的主要内容-->
    &lt;meta name="description" content="便携小电视 | 小k">

    &lt;!--指定IE和Chrome使用最新版本渲染当前页面-->
    &lt;meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"/>
    &lt;!--指导浏览器如何缓存某个响应以及缓存多长时间-->
    &lt;!--no-cache:先发送请求,与服务器确认该资源是否被更改,如果未被更改,则使用缓存
    no-store:不允许缓存,每次都要去服务器上,下载完整的响应(安全措施)
    public:缓存所有响应,但并非必须,因为max-age也可以做到相同效果
    private:只为单个用户缓存,因此不允许任何中继进行缓存,(比如说CDN就不允许缓存private的响应)
    maxage:当前请求开始,该响应在多久内能被缓存和重用,而不去服务器重新请求,例:max-age=60表示响应可以再缓存和重用60秒
    -->
    &lt;meta http-equiv="cache-control" content="no-cache">
    &lt;!--禁止百度自动转码 用于禁止当前页面在移动端浏览时,被百度自动转码,虽然百度的本意是好的,但是转码效果很多时候却不尽人意-->
    &lt;!--meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-siteapp" /-->
    &lt;!-- 分享网页时显示的标题-QQ-->

    &lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no minimal-ui">

    noindex,follow:不许抓取本页，但是可以顺着本页抓取索引别的链接

    &lt;div class="centent">

        &lt;div class="main">

                    &lt;!--视频-->

        &lt;video id="video1" class="video" style="display: none;" poster="./assets/img/bg.gif">
          &lt;source src="./api.php" type="video/mp4">

          您的浏览器不支持 HTML5 video 标签。
        &lt;/video>
      &lt;/div>
                    &lt;!-- 电视视频显示区 -->

                &lt;/div>
                &lt;!-- 电视底部增加边框 -->
                &lt;div class="ds-wk-btt">
                    &lt;div class="ds-wk-btt-bz">&lt;/div>
                    &lt;div class="ds-wk-btt-bz2">&lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>




                &lt;!-- 遥控器区 -->
            &lt;div class="yao">
                &lt;div class="yao-an">
                    &lt;!-- 开机 -->
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-on" onclick="on()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-guanji">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>
                    &lt;!-- 关机 -->
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-off" onclick="off()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-guanji">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>

                &lt;!-- 音量加 -->
                &lt;div class="yao-an-yl">
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-yl-jia" onclick="setHalfVolume()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-yinliangjia">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>




                &lt;!-- 换台 -->
                &lt;div class="yao-an-ht">
                    &lt;!-- 换台左 -->
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-ht-zuo" onclick="ht()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-ziyuan1">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>

                    &lt;!-- 暂停和播放 -->
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-ht-you" onclick="playPause()">&lt;i id="zt" class="iconfont icon-jixu">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>

                    &lt;!-- 换台右 -->
                    &lt;div id="ht" class="yao-an-ht-you" onclick="ht()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-you">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>




                
                
                
                &lt;!-- 音量减 -->
                &lt;div class="yao-an-yl">
                    &lt;div class="yao-an-yl-jian" onclick="setFullVolume()">&lt;i class="iconfont icon-yinliangjian">&lt;/i>&lt;/div>
                &lt;/div>
            
            

            &lt;/div>
            &lt;!-- 遥控器区 -->

&lt;!-- 换台 -->
&lt;script>
function ht(){
    var vidz =document.getElementById('vid').className;
    if (vidz == "m") {
        alert("请先开机");
    }
    else{
        var vidz = document.getElementById('video1').src = './api.php';
        document.getElementById("video1").play();
        zt.className = "iconfont icon-zantingtingzhi";
    }          
}
&lt;/script>








&lt;!-- 自动播放下一个视频 -->

&lt;script>


    var elevideo = document.getElementById("video1");
    elevideo.addEventListener('ended', function () { //结束
console.log("播放结束");
var vidz = document.getElementById('video1').src = './api.php';
                document.getElementById("video1").play();
                zt.className = "iconfont icon-zantingtingzhi";
}, false);




&lt;/script>




&lt;!-- 

&lt;button onclick="playPause()">播放&lt;/button> 
                    &lt;button onclick="makeBig()">暂停&lt;/button>

                    &lt;button onclick="setHalfVolume()" type="button">音量加&lt;/button>

              &lt;button onclick="setFullVolume()" type="button">音量减&lt;/button> -->


    



























&lt;!-- 开机 -->
&lt;script>
    function on(){
    document.getElementById('video1').style.display='block'; 
    var vidz = document.getElementById('vid').className = 'k';
                
}
&lt;/script>
&lt;!-- 关机 -->
&lt;script>
    function off(){
    document.getElementById('video1').style.display='none';  
    var vidz = document.getElementById('vid').className = 'm';
    myVideo.pause();
    zt.className = "iconfont icon-jixu";
}
&lt;/script>







      &lt;!-- 设置播放与暂停 -->
      &lt;script> 
        var myVideo=document.getElementById("video1"); 
        /* var o =document.getElementById("video1").style.display; */
        

        function playPause()
        {
            var vidz =document.getElementById('vid').className;
            if (vidz == "m") {
                alert("请先开机");
            }
            else{
                /* 播放 */
                if (myVideo.paused)
                {
                    myVideo.play();
                    zt.className = "iconfont icon-zantingtingzhi";
                }
                else
                {/* 暂停 */
                    myVideo.pause();
                    zt.className = "iconfont icon-jixu";
                }
            }
            
            
        } 
        &lt;/script>  


    &lt;!-- 设置音量加减 -->
    &lt;script>
        myVid=document.getElementById("video1");
        myVid.volume=0.2;
        function setHalfVolume()
        {
            var yl=myVid.volume+0.01
            myVid.volume=yl;
        } 
        function setFullVolume()
        {
            var yl=myVid.volume-0.01
            myVid.volume=yl;
        }
    &lt;/script> 








&lt;/body>

<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group=""> *{
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}


.centent{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
}

div{
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-focus: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
}

.main{
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 960px;
    height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    
}

.ds{
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
   /*  background: chocolate; */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    
}

.ds-wk{
    width: 50%;
    height: 250px;
    background: #000000;
    border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
    margin-top: 60px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
} 
.video{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit:fill;
}

.ds-wk-btt{
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    /* /* background: #1f1e1e; */
    /* border:2px solid #1f1e1e;  */
    color: #ffffff;
    display: flex;

        /* justify-content: center;
        align-items: center; */
        justify-content: center;


}

.ds-wk-btt-bz{
    width: 5px;
    height: 20px;
    background: #1f1e1e;
    border-radius: 10px 0px 10px 0px; 
	transform: rotate(40deg);
    margin-top: -4px;
    margin-right: 80px;
}
.ds-wk-btt-bz2{
    width: 5px;
    height: 20px;
    background: #1f1e1e;
    border-radius: 0px 10px 0px 10px; 
	transform: rotate(-40deg);
    margin-top: -4px; 
    margin-left: 80px;
}
































/* 遥控器区 */
.yao{
    width: 100%;
    height: 50%;
    /* background: coral; */
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.yao-an{
    width: 30%;
    height: auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

.yao-an-on{
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    background: rgb(76, 175, 80);
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 10px rgba(73, 72, 72, 0.3);
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 360px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.yao-an-on:hover{
    background: rgb(66, 153, 69);
}
.yao-an-on>i{
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #ffffff;
}

.yao-an-off{
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    background: rgb(226, 12, 12);
    /* box-shadow:0px 5px 15px #a5a4a4; */
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 10px rgba(73, 72, 72, 0.3);
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 360px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.yao-an-off:hover{
    background: rgb(196, 10, 10);
}
.yao-an-off>i{
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #ffffff;
}




/* 音量加*/
.yao-an-yl{
    width: 30%;
    height: auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}
.yao-an-yl-jia{
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    background: #e0e0e0;
    /* box-shadow:0px 5px 15px #a5a4a4; */
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 10px rgba(73, 72, 72, 0.5);
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 360px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;

}
.yao-an-yl-jia:hover{
    background: rgb(192, 189, 189);
}
.yao-an-yl-jia>i{
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #333232;
}





/* 换台 */

.yao-an-ht{
    width: 30%;
    height: auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-evenly;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    background: #e0e0e0;

/* 动画区 */
/* 达到850分辨率改变 */
@media screen and (max-width:850px) {
    .yao-an{
        width: 40%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .yao-an-ht{
        width: 40%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .ds-wk{
        width: 60%;
        height: 250px;
        background: #000000;
        border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
        margin-top: 60px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
}

/* 达到700分辨率改变 */
@media screen and (max-width:700px) {
    .yao-an{
        width: 40%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .yao-an-ht{
        width: 45%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .ds-wk{
        width: 80%;
        height: 250px;
        background: #000000;
        border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
        margin-top: 60px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
}



/* 达到530分辨率改变 */
@media screen and (max-width:530px) {
    .yao-an{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .yao-an-ht{
        width: 55%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .ds-wk{
        width: 95%;
        height: 200px;
        background: #000000;
        border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
        margin-top: 60px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
}




/* 达到400分辨率改变 */
@media screen and (max-width:400px) {
    .yao-an{
        width: 70%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .yao-an-ht{
        width: 75%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .ds-wk{
        width: 95%;
        height: 200px;
        background: #000000;
        border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
        margin-top: 60px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
}



/* 达到300分辨率改变 */
@media screen and (max-width:300px) {
    .yao-an{
        width: 80%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .yao-an-ht{
        width: 90%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        margin-top: 20px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    .yao-an-yl{
        width: 50%;
        height: auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .ds-wk{
        width: 95%;
        height: 200px;
        background: #000000;
        border:2px solid #1f1e1e;
        margin-top: 60px;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
}</code></pre>

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>对应的名称按顺序如下</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>666.gif</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>bg.gif</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>bg.png</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>bg2.jpg</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>可在html代码中快速查找关键词随后添加</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>部分图片暂不需要添加看自己所需</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>不需要的=添加的图片已经删除了是搜不到的</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></blockquote>

		</wp:postmeta>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[wordpress纯代码生成sitemap.xml网站地图]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1265.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 05 Apr 2023 04:52:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1265</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>wordpress默认不带xml网站地图，<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads//" target="_blank"><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">我爱学</qc></a>之前一直使用的是<s>Google xml插件</s>，今天帖一下纯代码生成xml网站地图，能少用一款插件就少用一款插件。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BAsitemap.php"><strong>创建sitemap.php</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>网站根目录下新建一个sitemap.php文件，内容如下：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;?php
require('./wp-blog-header.php');
header("Content-type: text/xml");
header('HTTP/1.1 200 OK');
$posts_to_show = 1000; 
echo '&lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>';
echo '&lt;urlset xmlns="https://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns:mobile="https://www.baidu.com/schemas/sitemap-mobile/1/">'
?>
  &lt;url>
      &lt;loc>&lt;?php echo get_home_url(); ?>&lt;/loc>
      &lt;mobile:mobile type="pc,mobile"/>
      &lt;lastmod>&lt;?php $ltime = get_lastpostmodified(GMT);$ltime = gmdate('Y-m-dTH:i:s+00:00', strtotime($ltime)); echo $ltime; ?>&lt;/lastmod>
      &lt;changefreq>daily&lt;/changefreq>
      &lt;priority>1.0&lt;/priority>
  &lt;/url>
&lt;?php
/* 文章页面 */ 
$myposts = get_posts( "numberposts=" . $posts_to_show );
foreach( $myposts as $post ) { ?>
  &lt;url>
      &lt;loc>&lt;?php the_permalink(); ?>&lt;/loc>
      &lt;mobile:mobile type="pc,mobile"/>
      &lt;lastmod>&lt;?php the_time('c') ?>&lt;/lastmod>
      &lt;changefreq>monthly&lt;/changefreq>
      &lt;priority>0.6&lt;/priority>
  &lt;/url>
&lt;?php } /* 文章循环结束 */ ?>  
&lt;?php
/* 单页面 */ 
$mypages = get_pages();
if(count($mypages) > 0) {
    foreach($mypages as $page) { ?>
    &lt;url>
      &lt;loc>&lt;?php echo get_page_link($page->ID); ?>&lt;/loc>
      &lt;mobile:mobile type="pc,mobile"/>
      &lt;lastmod>&lt;?php echo str_replace(" ","T",get_page($page->ID)->post_modified); ?>+00:00&lt;/lastmod>
      &lt;changefreq>weekly&lt;/changefreq>
      &lt;priority>0.6&lt;/priority>
  &lt;/url>
&lt;?php }} /* 单页面循环结束 */ ?> 
&lt;?php
/* 博客分类 */ 
$terms = get_terms('category', 'orderby=name&amp;hide_empty=0' );
$count = count($terms);
if($count > 0){
foreach ($terms as $term) { ?>
    &lt;url>
      &lt;loc>&lt;?php echo get_term_link($term, $term->slug); ?>&lt;/loc>
      &lt;mobile:mobile type="pc,mobile"/>
      &lt;changefreq>weekly&lt;/changefreq>
      &lt;priority>0.8&lt;/priority>
  &lt;/url>
&lt;?php }} /* 分类循环结束 */?> 
&lt;?php
 /* 标签(可选) */
$tags = get_terms("post_tag");
foreach ( $tags as $key => $tag ) {
	$link = get_term_link( intval($tag->term_id), "post_tag" );
	     if ( is_wp_error( $link ) )
		  return false;
		  $tags[ $key ]->link = $link;
?>
 &lt;url>
      &lt;loc>&lt;?php echo $link; ?>&lt;/loc>
      &lt;mobile:mobile type="pc,mobile"/>
      &lt;changefreq>monthly&lt;/changefreq>
      &lt;priority>0.4&lt;/priority>
  &lt;/url>
&lt;?php  } /* 标签循环结束 */ ?> 
&lt;/urlset></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E4%BC%AA%E9%9D%99%E6%80%81"><strong>设置伪静态</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>nginx添加如下伪静态规则：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">rewrite ^/sitemap.xml$ /sitemap.php last;</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>复制</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>访问:你的域名/sitemap.xml</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

<figure class="wp-block-gallery has-nested-images columns-default"><!-- wp:image {"id":1270,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->

<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/1680671541-1680671255349.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1272"/></figure>

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">php端配置教程</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.首先你得拥有一个主机/服务器</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2.将php源码上传解压，并绑定好域名</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">后台的配置教程</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.无需配置，安装之后跟着操作就行</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">木马端配置教程</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.打开木马端文件，不是安装！！！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2.打开至 /assets/res/ 这个目录</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3.修改里面的wz文件修改成你的域名，例如:http://baidu.com/</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4.签名之后就可以正常使用</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>5.下载的图片会保存在这个目录/storage/emulated/0/DCIM/BC/</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[YpayV6迁移至V7数据库教程]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1380.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 03 May 2023 06:15:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1380</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">打开数据库工具phpMyAdmin</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1397,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109592-3ec2d0d9c021cbca9f6a0dff273be3b0.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1397"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">登录你的V6数据库和V7数据库</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">V7数据库操作删除ypay_user和ypay_vip的表</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1398,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109594-b08c144bcc45839466c1c544150d67c0.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1398"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">一、套餐迁移</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">1.打开ypay_vip数据表的SQL执行语句</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1399,"width":900,"height":485,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109594-deaef47612507842697023ae70c2b573.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1399" width="900" height="485"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1400,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109595-cea44114be5b2d211652085949b206ee.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1400"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">语句如下：</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">ALTER TABLE `ypay_vip`

ADD COLUMN `is_premium` INT(10) NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否开启补价升级' AFTER `create_time`,
ADD COLUMN `premium_discount` INT(10) NULL COMMENT '补价升级百分比' AFTER `is_premium`;</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">2.执行完该语句后导出ypay_vip到V7替换即可</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">二、用户迁移</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1401,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109596-3e197ffcad223770db2b1998ee1cdc2a.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1401"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">1.同样打开ypay_user数据库的SQL并执行语句</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":94,"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109597-3a3c56d092c8e71d54dc5a6473f32f74.png"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109597-3a3c56d092c8e71d54dc5a6473f32f74.png" alt="密码保护：Ypay V6迁移至V7数据库教程 密码：sh666" class="wp-image-94"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">2.先执行以下语句：</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `nickname`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `timeout_url`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `timeout_time`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `loginfailure`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `console_notity`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `console_temp`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `yuyin_tips`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `login_email_tips`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `money_tips`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `appkey`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `googlekey`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `order_tips`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `lose_tips`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `is_payPopUp`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `switch_type`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `switch_url`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `switch_id`;
ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` drop `switch_key`</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">3.继续执行以下语句</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">ALTER TABLE `ypay_user` 
ADD COLUMN `wxpusher_uid` varchar(50) default null COMMENT 'WxPusher_UID' AFTER `mobile`;</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">4.执行完语句后导出ypay_user到V7替换即可</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">5.打开V7的数据库中ypay_userbasic表的SQL继续执行语句，（<a href="https://yfx.2sha.cn/ypay%E8%AF%AD%E5%8F%A5.html">点击前往获取</a>）</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">注意：这里的语句预留了4500多个用户的语句，不够的自己加，多余的不要执行，只复制自己需要的，不懂请点开图片仔细看说明。</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1403,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109598-5a8323581c862a55221c64df240f3d8c.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1403"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">5.完成以上就成功迁移V6的用户数据了</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">三、套餐迁移（必做）（必做）（必做）</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">1.打开V6数据库的ypay_vip表的SQL执行以下语句</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">ALTER TABLE `ypay_vip`
ADD COLUMN `is_premium` INT(10) NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否开启补价升级' AFTER `create_time`,
ADD COLUMN `premium_discount` INT(10) NULL COMMENT '补价升级百分比' AFTER `is_premium`;</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1404,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683109599-7bb60ab0b7c96583158f3d310ac29dde.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1404"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">执行完导入到V7表中即可完成套餐的迁移</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[【站长亲测】彩虹工具网程序开源未加密版]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1382.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 03 May 2023 08:51:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1382</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>支持高达72种站长工具、开发工具、娱乐工具等功能。本地调用API、自带免费API接口，是一个多功能性工具程序支持后台管理、上传插件、添加增减删功能。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>环境要求：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PHP &gt;= 7.4</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>MySQL &gt;= 5.6</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>fileinfo 扩展</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>安装教程：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>设置运行目录为 public</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>设置伪静态 thinkphp 规则</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>访问 http://你的域名/install 进行安装</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[小程序免300认证费教程]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/1419.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 07 May 2023 10:40:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.woax.cn/?p=1419</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>❗❗仔细看教程！仔细看教程！仔细看教程！认证是官方服务商认证渠道，认证出来的小程序和普通小程序没有任何区别，都是官方小程序！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PS：遇到问题先自查，认证价格低，店铺为了走量只提供自助认证提交服务，如果实在操作有问题有难度，不会操作可以联系客服付费人工代注册！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>①法人在创建小程序前，一定要核实自己的微信是否已经满绑5个小程序了，如果满绑5个是注册不了的，请移步看管理员注册通道操作说明：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>满绑5个是注册不了，会出现创建小程序失败的提示！！只能通过管理员通道申请！！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>②注册前先自查自己的营业执照是否在国家企业公示系统中能查询到，<strong>是否已经满</strong><strong>7天</strong><strong>公示期，</strong><strong>新注册的营业执照未满公示期不能认证，不能认证，不能认证！因国家公示系统和腾讯的验证系统之间有时间差，需在注册营业执照满7天后才能进行认证注册！否则会返回“企业与法人信息验证不一致”的错误提示！是因为腾讯数据库查询不到你的企业信息!</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>国家工商公示系统：</strong><a href="https://www.gsxt.gov.cn/">https://www.gsxt.gov.cn/</a>在这里面查询，营业执照注册日期到今天为止大于7天就没问题！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>③</strong><strong>法人微信号不是手机号，不是QQ号</strong><strong>，是法人微信头像下的那串英文ID，字母加数字的，不要填错！不要填错！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第一步</strong>，员工或其他代提交，一定要注意，认证小程序免300元，</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>法人</strong><strong>必须先关注“公众平台安全助手”</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>法人</strong><strong>必须先关注“公众平台安全助手”</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>法人</strong><strong>必须先关注“公众平台安全助手”！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>否则</strong><strong>法人</strong><strong>会收不到法人的扫脸认证信息！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>↓↓↓↓</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1437,"width":183,"height":185,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455911-AgAACO_xXFxqFdZJpLJBk5XD4Y5sIRf4.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1437" width="183" height="185"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>↑↑↑↑<strong>公众平台安全助手</strong>↑↑↑↑</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第二步，</strong>💖关注后微信扫码进入小程序开始认证！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1436,"width":215,"height":215,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455687-下载.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1436" width="215" height="215"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>扫码进入小程序进行申请或搜索“公众微助手”</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>手机端点击链接可直接跳转至小程序 ↓ ↓ ↓</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="https://wxaurl.cn/SgMgdBflK3m">https://wxaurl.cn/SgMgdBflK3m</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第三步，</strong>进入到小程序界面点击我的-点击登录，保证小程序属于登录状态！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第三步，</strong>进入到小程序界面点击我的-点击登录，保证小程序属于登录状态！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1420,"width":414,"height":896,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454450-AgAACO_xXFzczxRkVAVMs7zgr_dvrAry.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1420" width="414" height="896"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1421,"width":414,"height":896,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454483-AgAACO_xXFwAcl0MX1VIJrX2OlU4ElVF.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1421" width="414" height="896"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第四步，</strong>进入首页后，小程序免300认证就点击程序认证里的这两个选项，这里是<strong>法人注册通道</strong>，如果你是代提交，也一定注意选择正确，<strong>根据你的营业执照属性来选择，企业公司营业执照选择企业/有限公司通道，个体工商户选择个体工商户通道！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1422,"width":305,"height":578,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454511-AgAACO_xXFx53yFyfBpGbbKFIahwA75s.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1422" width="305" height="578"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>企业或个体的填写资料方式都是一样的，都是需要营业执照，填写法人微信号及法人姓名的！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第五步，</strong>进入相应界面，开始填写资料！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1423,"width":308,"height":411,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454542-AgAACO_xXFxUII4DRQ1CMKsBgLkFcNUZ.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1423" width="308" height="411"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>❗❗❗这里一定要注意！！</strong><strong>法人WX号是法人身份证实名的微信头像下的英文字母ID</strong><strong>，</strong><strong>不是手机号，也不是关联的QQ号！！</strong><strong>一定要记住不要填写成手机号了！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>❗❗❗这里一定要注意！！</strong><strong>法人WX号是法人身份证实名的微信头像下的英文字母ID</strong><strong>，</strong><strong>不是手机号，也不是关联的QQ号！！</strong><strong>一定要记住不要填写成手机号了！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>❗❗❗这里一定要注意！！</strong><strong>法人WX号是法人身份证实名的微信头像下的英文字母ID</strong><strong>，</strong><strong>不是手机号，也不是关联的QQ号！！</strong><strong>一定要记住不要填写成手机号了！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>因为很多客户提交的时候把这里填写成QQ号或者手机号，导致公众平台安全助手的推送认证信息发不过来，这种情况无法处理，只能重新提交资料，浪费大家的时间！如果你不知道微信</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>号是多少，看下面的图！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1424,"width":270,"height":380,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454789-qq_pic_merged_1683454761113.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1424" width="270" height="380"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第六步，</strong>填完资料，点击提交按钮，企业和个体都是只用填这些资料！提交后到达支付页面</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1425,"width":270,"height":585,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454918-Screenshot_20230507_182123_com.tencent.mm_.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1425" width="270" height="585"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第七步，</strong><strong>在-我的，进行中的订单中找到订单，点击查看进度！看到“请法人确认验证信息”，那就去</strong><strong>公众平台安全助手中查看验证信息</strong><strong>，这会法人的微信是已经收到了验证信息的！然后开始验证！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1426,"width":190,"height":304,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454945-AgAACO_xXFyqX2juMRZHdrs_Zl0HN_-.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1426" width="190" height="304"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>↑↑↑这个状态就可以进入公众平台安全助手看验证信息了！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>↓↓↓然后去公众平台安全助手</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1427,"width":212,"height":434,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454971-AgAACO_xXFz8qmdHr61KlaCRxdnliBeV.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1427" width="212" height="434"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>点击创建小程序申请</strong>，按照步骤进行人脸识别验证！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1428,"width":407,"height":713,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683454994-AgAACO_xXFw8QbUAeWlGlLwM5qLgkcXP.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1428" width="407" height="713"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>扫脸认证没有特殊的地方，要法人在阳光充足，环境明亮的地方进行扫脸认证！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第八步，</strong>认证成功后，公众平台安全助手还会收到两条信息，提示进行邮箱绑定！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1429,"width":196,"height":417,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455314-AgAACO_xXFzqIsB7G7NNFLcUrYkzfdI-.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1429" width="196" height="417"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>点击前往设置邮箱密码，或者搜索小程序助手进入绑定邮箱</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1430,"width":215,"height":215,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455382-下载.jpg" alt="" class="wp-image-1430" width="215" height="215"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>小程序助手</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第九步，</strong>进入小程序助手后，选择刚才你认证通过的小程序的原始ID，gh_XXXXX这个ID就是你刚认证的小程序，点击进入，这个XXX不是真的XXX，每个小程序的编号不一样，这里为编号！不要理解错了，然后给客服说找不到！看到gh_开头的就是你的小程序！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1431,"width":196,"height":388,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455419-AgAACO_xXFze3Pk53nRDbL-BWk120pef.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1431" width="196" height="388"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>进入后点击你的ID名称，进入下一个界面绑定登录邮箱！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1433,"width":302,"height":516,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455521-AgAACO_xXFz9CX7glGBJpqNm9WCnpMyj.jpeg" alt="" class="wp-image-1433" width="302" height="516"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>点击登录邮箱，进入填写你的登录邮箱和登录密码，接收一个邮箱验证码即可绑定成功！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>❗❗❗这里也要注意，账号不能登录错，很多客户之前注册的有一个小程序，在这里登录到自己之前的小程序里了，然后给客服说，都已经认证了为什么还要认证！遇到这个问题百分之百是你把账号登录错了，<strong>点下面的切换账号，仔细核对！！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>第十步，进入小程序官方平台，用法人的微信扫码登录或者用绑定的邮箱登录都可以，登录之后去填写基础资料，上传头像即可，上传完头像可以去基础资料里更改小程序名称！到这里就全部完成了！官方后台地址: </strong><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com">https://mp.weixin.qq.com</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>上传代码提示被禁用，请到后台版本管理里解除授权即可！不影响使用！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1434,"width":747,"height":447,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455551-AgAACO_xXFzh2c-X_xpGL5ZuJlvmP2Sr.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1434" width="747" height="447"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>查看</strong><strong>已认证</strong><strong>成功在基础资料里看！</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PS：遇到问题先自查，认证价格低，店铺为了走量只提供自助认证提交服务，如果实在操作有问题有难度，不会操作可以联系客服人工代注册！如果因营业执照公示期未到，腾讯系统提示“工商数据返回：“企业信息或法定代表人信息不一致”这种情况，一般是新办理的营业执照，腾讯数据库未查询到营业执照信息，需要等2-7天之后再进行认证！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":1} -->
<h1 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>小程序认证说明-管理员通道</strong></h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1435,"sizeSlug":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1683455602-AgAACO_xXFyQJoHGyCNBHovg_2M-xLIN.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1435"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5」v1.576.537 顶级版]]></title>
		<link>https://www.woax.cn/2135.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 22 May 2023 16:26:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[zxcv25]]></dc:creator>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">游戏介绍</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>《极限竞速：地平线5》是由微软发行的一款赛车竞速游戏，也是地平线系列的最新作品。不同于正传 Foza 系列，地平线系列的拟真元素要少了许多，重心更加偏向于街车与自由度方面。操作手感上也更轻量化，更加的爽快和刺激。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">游戏视频</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/dplayer -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-dplayer new-dplayer post-dplayer" video-url="https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/256859757/movie480_vp9.webm?t=1636489104" media-id="" video-pic="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1685028987-13183c3c76ed113d14b737ad24135784.jpeg" data-loop="" data-hide="" data-autoplay="true" data-volume="1"><div class="graphic" style="padding-bottom:50%"><div class="abs-center text-center"><i class="fa fa-play-circle fa-4x muted-3-color opacity5"></i></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/dplayer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading">游戏截图</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801529-c95d295f12c0fcfb936f2867afa5fdac.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801529-c95d295f12c0fcfb936f2867afa5fdac.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801535-721426c0128a65c302b7b286ca5cf9da.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801535-721426c0128a65c302b7b286ca5cf9da.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>

<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801544-2f7c7591c849438fa668c2dee6718409.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801544-2f7c7591c849438fa668c2dee6718409.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801549-9030e0a9d74744d582662eaf7d4381ed.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801549-9030e0a9d74744d582662eaf7d4381ed.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801554-e7a68fe19e1b23245d69fe7b518aec10.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801554-e7a68fe19e1b23245d69fe7b518aec10.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801559-33755d8fb96476299ccf4a16f5a34c82.jpeg"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1684801559-33755d8fb96476299ccf4a16f5a34c82.jpeg" alt="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版" title="赛车竞速游戏「极限竞速：地平线 5 」v1.576.537 顶级版"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"linkDestination":"custom"} -->

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":2203,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"attachment"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><a href="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1685060062-1685059937082.png"><img src="https://cdn.woax.cn/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/1685060062-1685059937082.png" alt="" class="wp-image-2203"/></a></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">简介：</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br>夏柔免费API管理系统是基于ZeroArt二开美化 页面方式仿的APIFox，严禁商用，仅供学习测试交流！内置100+免费接口（远程），部署即用，内置的远程接口可持续提供调用服务！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading">安装教程：</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.修改数据库信息配置config/database.PHP<br>2.导入数据库文件bygoukai.sql<br>3.设置网站运行目录为根目录public<br>4.后台地址：你的域名/admin/login.html<br>5.账户密码：admin 123456</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
